Kubernetes The Hard Way

23 –º–∞—Ä—Ç–∞ 2025 –≥. ¬∑ 13 –º–∏–Ω. —á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è
–ü—É—Ç–∏–ª–∏–Ω –î–º–∏—Ç—Ä–∏–π –õ—å–≤–æ–≤–∏—á
–ê—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä

Kubernetes The Hard Way #

–í–æ–∑–æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª—è–µ–º —Å–µ—Ä–∏—é —Å—Ç–∞—Ç–µ–π –ø–æ Kubernetes –≤ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–º —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç–µ.

–î–∞–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—å—è –æ–ø–∏—Å—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç –æ–±—â–∏–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä—É—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è Kubernetes –±–µ–∑ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤, —Ç–∞–∫–∏—Ö –∫–∞–∫ kubeadm. –ü—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥ —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å—É–µ—Ç—Å—è —Å –Ω–∞—à–µ–π –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—É—é –º—ã –≤–µ–¥—ë–º —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–Ω–æ –ª—É—á—à–∏–º –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∞–º –∏ –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º IAC.

–í—Å—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è, –ø—Ä–∏–≤–µ–¥—ë–Ω–Ω–∞—è –¥–∞–ª–µ–µ, –≤ —Ç–æ—á–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –ø–æ–≤—Ç–æ—Ä—è–µ—Ç –ø–æ–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ kubeadm. –í —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–µ, –∏—Ç–æ–≥–æ–≤—ã–π –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω–æ –æ—Ç–ª–∏—á–∏—Ç—å ‚Äî —Å–æ–±—Ä–∞–Ω –ª–∏ –æ–Ω —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é kubeadm –∏–ª–∏ –≤—Ä—É—á–Ω—É—é.

1. –í–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ‚Äã

Kubernetes —Å—Ç–∞–ª —Å—Ç–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ä—Ç–æ–º –¥–µ-—Ñ–∞–∫—Ç–æ –¥–ª—è —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è–º–∏. –ï–≥–æ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ␀–≤–∫–∞ –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –≤–æ –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ–º —É–ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∏–ª–∏—Å—å, –±–ª–∞–≥–æ–¥–∞—Ä—è —Ç–∞–∫–∏–º –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º, –∫–∞–∫ kubeadm, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –±–µ—Ä—É—Ç –Ω–∞ —Å–µ–±—è –≥–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—é —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤, –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ –±–∞–∑–æ–≤—É—é –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—é –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞.

–û–¥–Ω–∞–∫–æ, –∑–∞ —É–¥–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º —Å–∫—Ä—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω–∞—è –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞, –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–π –∫—Ä–∏—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤—ã—Ö —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π, —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–∏ —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–π –∏–ª–∏ –æ—Ç–ª–∞–¥–∫–µ –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–¥–∞–∫—à–µ–Ω–µ. –ß—Ç–æ–±—ã –ø–æ-–Ω–∞—Å—Ç–æ—è—â–µ–º—É –ø–æ–Ω—è—Ç—å, –∫–∞–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä Kubernetes, –≤–∞–∂–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–æ–π—Ç–∏ –ø—É—Ç—å —Ä–∞–∑–≤—ë—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –≤—Ä—É—á–Ω—É—é ‚Äî –æ—Ç –∏–Ω–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏, –¥–æ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–π –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏.

Kubernetes The Hard Way ‚Äî —ç—Ç–æ —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–æ, –≤ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä —Ä–∞–∑–≤–æ—Ä–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –ø–æ—ç—Ç–∞–ø–Ω–æ, –±–µ–∑ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è kubeadm –∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤. –í–º–µ—Å—Ç–æ —á—ë—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ —è—â–∏–∫–∞ ‚Äî –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤—Å–µ—Ö —à–∞–≥–æ–≤, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –æ–±—ã—á–Ω–æ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è—é—Ç—Å—è –ø–æ–¥ –∫–∞–ø–æ—Ç–æ–º.

–ö–∞–∂–¥—ã–π —ç—Ç–∞–ø —Å–æ–æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤—É–µ—Ç –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–π —Ñ–∞–∑–µ kubeadm init –∏–ª–∏ kubeadm join, –Ω–æ —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω –≤—Ä—É—á–Ω—É—é, —Å —è–≤–Ω–æ–π –≥–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π –∫–ª—é—á–µ–π, –ø–æ–¥–≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–∫–æ–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–π, –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–æ–º –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–æ–π —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏—è —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã.

üí° –†–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç ‚Äî –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π Kubernetes-–∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä, –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ –Ω–µ–æ—Ç–ª–∏—á–∏–º—ã–π –æ—Ç —Å–æ–±—Ä–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ kubeadm, –Ω–æ –ø–æ–¥–≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Å –ø–æ–ª–Ω—ã–º –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º –≤—Å–µ—Ö –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–∏—Ö —Å–≤—è–∑–µ–π.

–£—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –ø–æ–¥–≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–∫–∏

–°—Ç–∞—Ç—å—è —Ä–∞—Å—Å—á–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–∞ –Ω–∞ —á–∏—Ç–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π —É–∂–µ –∑–Ω–∞–∫–æ–º —Å –±–∞–∑–æ–≤—ã–º–∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–µ–ø—Ü–∏—è–º–∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ Kubernetes –≤ —Ü–µ–ª–æ–º. –ë–µ–∑ —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ —É—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –¥–µ—Ç–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –∏–∑–±—ã—Ç–æ—á–Ω—ã–º. –ï—Å–ª–∏ –≤—ã —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –Ω–∞—á–∏–Ω–∞–µ—Ç–µ, —Ä–µ–∫–æ–º–µ–Ω–¥—É–µ–º –æ–∑–Ω–∞–∫–æ–º–∏—Ç—å—Å—è —Å –æ—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–º Kubernetes Bootcamp.

üîß –ü—Ä–µ–¥–∏—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏–µ: –ü–æ—á–µ–º—É –≤–∞–∂–µ–Ω –ø–æ—Ä—è–¥–æ–∫ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞

–ù–µ–∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω—ã —Ç–∞–∫, —á—Ç–æ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç—ã –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏–º—ã, –∞ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏–º–∏ —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ —Å–∞–º–æ–π —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã. –≠—Ç–æ —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É–µ—Ç —á—ë—Ç–∫–æ–≥–æ –ø–æ—Ä—è–¥–∫–∞ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π:

  • ‚öôÔ∏è –í–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç—å –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤
    –û–¥–∏–Ω –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç –Ω–µ –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –±–µ–∑ –¥—Ä—É–≥–æ–≥–æ.
    –ü—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: API —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É–µ—Ç —Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–∏–ª–∏—â–µ, –∞ —Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–∏–ª–∏—â–µ ‚Äî —Å–µ—Ç—å –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—é.

  • ‚è± –ù–µ–ª—å–∑—è –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞—Ç—å –≤—Å—ë –æ–¥–Ω–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ
    –ü–∞—Ä–∞–ª–ª–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ –ø—Ä–∏–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç –∫ –Ω–µ–∂–µ–ª–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–º —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–∞–º.
    –ü—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: –ü–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤—â–∏–∫ –∂–¥—ë—Ç API, –∞ API ‚Äî –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫—É –∏ –∏–Ω–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—é –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö.

  • üîÑ –ß–∞—Å—Ç—å –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –∏–∑–≤–Ω–µ
    –î–æ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã –Ω–µ–∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å—ã —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç—É—é—Ç —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ.
    –ü—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: kubelet –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ systemd, –∞ –Ω–µ –∫–∞–∫ —á–∞—Å—Ç—å –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞.

  • üõ† –ù—É–∂–µ–Ω bootstrap-—ç—Ç–∞–ø
    –ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥–∏, —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç—ã, –∞–¥—Ä–µ—Å–∞ ‚Äî –≤—Å—ë –ø–æ–¥–≥–æ—Ç–∞–≤–ª–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –≤—Ä—É—á–Ω—É—é.
    –ü—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: –ù–∞—á–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –≥–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è root CA, kubeconfig, static pod-–º–∞–Ω–∏—Ñ–µ—Å—Ç–æ–≤.

  • ü§ñ –ü–µ—Ä–µ—Ö–æ–¥ –∫ —Å–∞–º–æ—É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—é
    –ü–æ—Å–ª–µ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ –Ω–∞—á–∏–Ω–∞–µ—Ç —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ–∏–º–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–∞–º–∏ –∏ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏–µ–º.
    –ü—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: –£–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—é—â–∏–µ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç—ã –Ω–∞—á–∏–Ω–∞—é—Ç –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –¥—Ä—É–≥ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∞ —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ API.

–í–∞–∂–Ω–æ

–ë–µ–∑ —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–≥–æ –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª—ë–Ω–Ω–æ–π –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Ç–∞–∫–∞—è —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ –Ω–µ –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç. –ò–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –ø–æ—ç—Ç–æ–º—É —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—Ç –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã –∏ —É—Ç–∏–ª–∏—Ç—ã, –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä, kubeadm, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ —É—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—è—é—Ç –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º—É ¬´–∫—É—Ä–∏—Ü—ã –∏ —è–π—Ü–∞¬ª –∏ –∑–∞–¥–∞—é—Ç –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω—ã–π –ø–æ—Ä—è–¥–æ–∫ —Ä–∞–∑–≤—ë—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.

–ì–ª–∞–≤—ã:

  • 1. –í–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ
  • 2. –ü–æ—á–µ–º—É ¬´The Hard Way¬ª
  • 3. –ê—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è
  • 4. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã
  • 5. –ë–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞—è –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ —É–∑–ª–æ–≤
  • 6. –ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞ –º–æ–¥—É–ª–µ–π —è–¥—Ä–∞
  • 7. –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä–æ–≤ sysctl
  • 8. –£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤
  • 9. –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤
  • 10. –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤
  • 11. –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ —Å —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞–º–∏
  • 12. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ—Ä–Ω–µ–≤—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤
  • 13. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π
  • 14. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–ª—é—á–∞ –ø–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∏ ServiceAccount
  • 15*. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤—Å–µ—Ö —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤
  • 16. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–π kubeconfig
  • 17*. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤—Å–µ—Ö kubeconfig
  • 18. –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –±–ª–æ–∫–∞ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤
  • 19. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ static pod-–æ–≤ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—é—â–µ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—É—Ä–∞
  • 20*. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤—Å–µ—Ö static pod-–æ–≤ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—é—â–µ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—É—Ä–∞
  • 21. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ static pod-–æ–≤ ETCD –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞
  • 22. –ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ —Å–ª—É–∂–±—ã Kubelet
  • 23. –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏—è –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞
  • 24. –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ —Ä–æ–ª–µ–≤–æ–π –º–æ–¥–µ–ª–∏
  • 25. –ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –≤ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä
  • 26. –ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞ –∫–æ—Ä–Ω–µ–≤—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –≤ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä
  • 27. –ú–∞—Ä–∫–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∞ –∏ –æ–≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —É–∑–ª–æ–≤

2. –ü–æ—á–µ–º—É ¬´The Hard Way¬ª‚Äã

–†–∞–∑–≤—ë—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ Kubernetes –≤—Ä—É—á–Ω—É—é —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É–µ—Ç –¥–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —É—Å–∏–ª–∏–π. –û–¥–Ω–∞–∫–æ, –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥ –æ–±–ª–∞–¥–∞–µ—Ç —Ä—è–¥–æ–º –ø—Ä–µ–∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤:

  • –û–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç —É–≥–ª—É–±–ª—ë–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –∏ –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–µ–π –ª–æ–≥–∏–∫–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ Kubernetes.
  • –ü–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –≥–∏–±–∫–æ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞ –ø–æ–¥ –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω—ã–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.

3. –ê—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è‚Äã

–£—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤

–ù–∏–∂–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≤–µ–¥—ë–Ω —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤, –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—ã—Ö –¥–ª—è —Ä—É—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–∞–∑–≤—ë—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞. –î–ª—è –æ–±–µ␀—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–æ–≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –≤—Å–µ –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–∏ –¥–æ–ª–∂–Ω—ã –±—ã—Ç—å —Å–∏–Ω—Ö—Ä–æ–Ω–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω—ã –º–µ–∂–¥—É —Å–æ–±–æ–π.

–ö–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–í–µ—Ä—Å–∏—è–ù–∞–∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ
containerd1.7.19–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–Ω—Ç–∞–π–º, —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—é—â–∏–π –∂–∏–∑–Ω–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º —Ü–∏–∫–ª–æ–º –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤.
runcv1.1.12–ù–∏–∑–∫–æ—É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ–≤—ã–π –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç –¥–ª—è –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤ —Å –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º —Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤ —è–¥—Ä–∞ Linux.
crictlv1.30.0–£—Ç–∏–ª–∏—Ç–∞ –¥–ª—è –æ—Ç–ª–∞–¥–∫–∏ CRI-—Å—Ä–µ–¥ —Å –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–æ–π –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è —Å containerd.
kubectlv1.30.4–ö–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç –¥–ª—è –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è —Å Kubernetes API.
kubeadmv1.30.4

–ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç –¥–ª—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏ –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ Kubernetes (–∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç—Å—è –¥–ª—è –≤–∞–ª–∏–¥–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏).

kubeletv1.30.4–ê–≥–µ–Ω—Ç, –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞–µ–º—ã–π –Ω–∞ –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–º —É–∑–ª–µ, –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–∏–≤–∞—é—â–∏–π –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª—å —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏—è –ø–æ–¥–æ–≤.
etcd3.5.12-0–†–∞—Å–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª—ë–Ω–Ω–æ–µ —Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–∏–ª–∏—â–µ —Ç–∏–ø–∞ "–∫–ª—é—á‚Äì–∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ" –¥–ª—è —Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏—è –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞.
kube-apiserverv1.30.4–ö–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç, –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è—é—â–∏–π REST API –¥–ª—è –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è —Å –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–æ–º.
kube-controller-managerv1.30.4–£–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏–µ–º –æ–±—ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –≤ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–µ —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é –≤—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª–ª–µ—Ä–æ–≤.
kube-schedulerv1.30.4–û—Ç–≤–µ—á–∞–µ—Ç –∑–∞ –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–∑–º–µ—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø–æ–¥–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ —É–∑–ª–∞—Ö.
conntrackv1.4.+–£—Ç–∏–ª–∏—Ç–∞ –¥–ª—è –æ—Ç—Å–ª–µ–∂–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã—Ö —Å–æ–µ–¥–∏–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–π (–∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç—Å—è iptables –∏ kubelet).
socat1.8.+–£—Ç–∏–ª–∏—Ç–∞ –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–æ–±—Ä–æ—Å–∞ –ø–æ—Ä—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ TCP-—Ç—É–Ω–Ω–µ–ª–µ–π (–∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç—Å—è –ø—Ä–∏ –æ—Ç–ª–∞–¥–∫–µ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–∫—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏).

–£—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –∫–æ–º–º—É—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏

–ö–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–ü–æ—Ä—Ç–ü—Ä–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–ª
etcd-server2379TCP
etcd-peer2380TCP
etcd-metrics2381TCP
kube-apiserver6443TCP
kube-controller-manager10257TCP
kube-scheduler10259TCP
kubelet-healthz10248TCP
kubelet-server10250TCP
kubelet-read-only-port10255TCP

–£—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –±–∞–ª–∞–Ω—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∏

IP-–∞–¥—Ä–µ—Å–¶–µ–ª–µ–≤–∞—è –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø–∞–ü–æ—Ä—Ç–¶–µ–ª–µ–≤–æ–π –ø–æ—Ä—Ç
VIP-LB- NODE-IP-1 - NODE-IP-2 - NODE-IP-364436443

DNS-–∑–∞–ø–∏—Å–∏

A-–∑–∞–ø–∏—Å—åIP-–∞–¥—Ä–µ—ÅTTL

api.my-first-cluster.example.com

VIP-LB60s

master-1.my-first-cluster.example.com

NODE-IP-160s

master-2.my-first-cluster.example.com

NODE-IP-260s

master-3.my-first-cluster.example.com

NODE-IP-360s

4. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã‚Äã

–ù–∞ —ç—Ç–æ–º —ç—Ç–∞–ø–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—ë—Ç—Å—è –±–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞—è –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞, –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—è –µ–≥–æ —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤—É—é —Å—Ö–µ–º—É, —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—é—â–∏–µ —É–∑–ª—ã –∏ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–µ –ø–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä—ã.

–°–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–µ

–ò–º—è–í–Ω–µ—à–Ω–∏–π –¥–æ–º–µ–Ω–í–µ—Ä—Å–∏—è Kubernetes
my-first-clusterexample.comv1.30.4

–£–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—é—â–∏–µ —É–∑–ª—ã

–ò–º—èIP-–∞–¥—Ä–µ—Å–û–ø–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–†–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å—ã

master-1.my-first-cluster.example.com

NODE-IP-1ubuntu-24-04-lts2CPU / 2RAM / 20GB

master-2.my-first-cluster.example.com

NODE-IP-2ubuntu-24-04-lts2CPU / 2RAM / 20GB

master-3.my-first-cluster.example.com

NODE-IP-3ubuntu-24-04-lts2CPU / 2RAM / 20GB

5. –ë–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞—è –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ —É–∑–ª–æ–≤‚Äã

–≠—Ç–æ—Ç —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –ø–æ—Å–≤—è—â—ë–Ω –±–∞–∑–æ–≤–æ–π –ø–æ–¥–≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–∫–µ —É–∑–ª–æ–≤ Kubernetes –ø–µ—Ä–µ–¥ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–æ–π –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤. –í –Ω—ë–º –æ–ø–∏—Å—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è, —Å–º–µ–Ω–∞ –∏–º–µ–Ω–∏ —Ö–æ—Å—Ç–∞ –∏ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω—ã—Ö —É—Ç–∏–ª–∏—Ç. –≠—Ç–∏ —à–∞–≥–∏ —è–≤–ª—è—é—Ç—Å—è –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–º–∏ –¥–ª—è –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã kubelet –∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—é—â–µ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—É—Ä–∞.

–ë–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞—è –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ —É–∑–ª–æ–≤

‚óè –û–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

–ë–∞–∑–æ–≤—ã–µ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ —É–∑–ª–æ–≤

  • –ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è —É–∑–ª–∞.
  • –ò–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏–º–µ–Ω–∏ —É␀–∑–ª–∞.
  • –£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π.

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è —É–∑–ª–∞

  • master-1
  • master-2
  • master-3
export HOST_NAME=master-1
export HOST_NAME=master-2
export HOST_NAME=master-3
export CLUSTER_NAME="my-first-cluster"
export BASE_DOMAIN="example.com"
export CLUSTER_DOMAIN="cluster.local"
export FULL_HOST_NAME="${HOST_NAME}.${CLUSTER_NAME}.${BASE_DOMAIN}"

–ò–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏–º–µ–Ω–∏ —É–∑–ª–∞

hostnamectl set-hostname ${FULL_HOST_NAME}

–£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π

  • apt
  • yum
  • dnf
sudo apt update
sudo apt install -y conntrack socat jq tree
sudo yum update
sudo yum install -y conntrack-tools socat jq tree
sudo dnf update
sudo dnf install -y conntrack-tools socat jq tree

6. –ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞ –º–æ–¥—É–ª–µ–π —è–¥—Ä–∞‚Äã

–≠—Ç–æ—Ç —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –ø–æ—Å–≤—è—â—ë–Ω –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–µ –º–æ–¥—É–ª–µ–π —è–¥—Ä–∞, –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—ã—Ö –¥–ª—è –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã Kubernetes. –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞–µ—Ç –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—é modprobe –∏ –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–∞—Ü–∏—é –º–æ–¥—É–ª–µ–π overlay –∏ br_netfilter, –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–∏–≤–∞—é—â–∏—Ö –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫—É –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–π —Ñ–∞–π–ª–æ–≤–æ–π —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã –∏ —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã—Ö —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–π. –≠—Ç–∏ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã –¥–ª—è —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã—Ö –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫, iptables –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–∞–Ω—Ç–∞–π–º–æ–≤.

–ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞ –º–æ–¥—É–ª–µ–π —è–¥—Ä–∞

‚óè –û–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

–≠—Ç–∞–ø—ã —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞:‚Äã

  • –ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è modprobe.
  • –ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞ –º–æ–¥—É–ª–µ–π.
  • Bash
  • Cloud-init

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è modprobe‚Äã

cat <<EOF > /etc/modules-load.d/k8s.conf
overlay
br_netfilter
EOF

–ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞ –º–æ–¥—É–ª–µ–π‚Äã

sudo -i
modprobe overlay
modprobe br_netfilter

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è modprobe‚Äã

# write_files:
- path: /etc/modules-load.d/k8s.conf
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    overlay
    br_netfilter

–ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞ –º–æ–¥—É–ª–µ–π‚Äã

# runcmd:
- modprobe overlay
- modprobe br_netfilter
–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—á–∞–Ω–∏–µ

–ú–æ–¥—É–ª—å overlay –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç—Å—è —Ñ–∞–π–ª–æ–≤–æ–π —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–æ–π OverlayFS –¥–ª—è —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–ª–æ—è–º–∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤. –û–Ω –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –æ–±—ä–µ–¥–∏–Ω—è—Ç—å –Ω–µ—Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π –≤ –µ–¥–∏–Ω—É—é –≤–∏—Ä—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω—É—é —Ñ–∞–π–ª–æ–≤—É—é —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—É. –ü—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω—è–µ—Ç—Å—è —Ç–∞–∫–∏–º–∏ —Ä–∞–Ω—Ç–∞–π–º–∞–º–∏, –∫–∞–∫ Docker –∏ containerd.

–ú–æ–¥—É–ª—å br_netfilter –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫—É —Ç—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫–∞ —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã—Ö –º–æ—Å—Ç–æ–≤ —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ –ø–æ–¥—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—É netfilter. –≠—Ç–æ –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ –¥–ª—è –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã iptables –≤ Kubernetes.

7. –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä–æ–≤ sysctl‚Äã

–≠—Ç–æ—Ç —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –ø–æ—Å–≤—è—â—ë–Ω –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–µ –ø–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä–æ–≤ —è–¥—Ä–∞ —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é sysctl, –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—ã—Ö –¥–ª—è —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã Kubernetes. –í–Ω–æ—Å—è—Ç—Å—è –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è, –æ–±–µ—Å␀–ø–µ—á–∏–≤–∞—é—â–∏–µ –º–∞—Ä—à—Ä—É—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—é —Ç—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫–∞ –º–µ–∂–¥—É –ø–æ–¥–∞–º–∏ –∏ –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω—É—é —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—É iptables –¥–ª—è –º–æ—Å—Ç–æ–≤. –≠—Ç–∏ –ø–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä—ã –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã –¥–ª—è –≤–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å—ã–ª–∫–∏ IP-–ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ —Ñ–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã—Ö –ø–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–≤ –≤ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–µ.

–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä–æ–≤ sysctl

‚óè –û–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

–≠—Ç–∞–ø—ã —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞:‚Äã

  • –ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è sysctl.
  • –ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞ –º–æ–¥—É–ª–µ–π.
–í–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ!

–°–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã–µ –ø–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä—ã‚Äã

–î–ª—è –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ–π –º–∞—Ä—à—Ä—É—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ —Ñ–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Ç—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫–∞ –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ –∑–∞–¥–∞—Ç—å –ø–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä—ã —è–¥—Ä–∞.

  • Bash
  • Cloud-init

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è sysctl‚Äã

cat <<EOF > /etc/sysctl.d/99-br-netfilter.conf
net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-iptables=1
net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-ip6tables=1
EOF

–ü—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏‚Äã

sysctl --system

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è sysctl‚Äã

# write_files:
- path: /etc/sysctl.d/99-br-netfilter.conf
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-iptables=1
    net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-ip6tables=1

–ü—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏‚Äã

# runcmd:
- sysctl --system

–ï—Å–ª–∏ –ø–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä net.ipv4.ip_forward –Ω–µ –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω, —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ –Ω–µ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å—ã–ª–∞—Ç—å IP-–ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç—ã –º–µ–∂–¥—É –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä—Ñ–µ–π—Å–∞–º–∏. –≠—Ç–æ –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –ø—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Å—Ç–∏ –∫ —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã–º —Å–±–æ—è–º –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞, –Ω–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ –∏ –ø–æ—Ç–µ—Ä–µ —Å–≤—è–∑–∏ –º–µ–∂–¥—É –ø–æ–¥–∞–º–∏.

  • Bash
  • Cloud-init

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è sysctl‚Äã

cat <<EOF > /etc/sysctl.d/99-network.conf
net.ipv4.ip_forward=1
EOF
sysctl --system

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è sysctl‚Äã

# write_files:
- path: /etc/sysctl.d/99-network.conf
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    net.ipv4.ip_forward=1

–ü—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏‚Äã

# runcmd:
- sysctl --system

8. –£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤‚Äã

–í —ç—Ç–æ–º —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–µ –æ–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤, –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—ã—Ö –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã Kubernetes-–∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞. –£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –≤—Ä—É—á–Ω—É—é –∏ –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –ø–æ–¥–≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–ª—è –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö —ç—Ç–∞–ø–æ–≤ –∏–Ω–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—é—â–µ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—É—Ä–∞.

  • runc
  • containerd
  • kubelet
  • etcd
  • kubectl
  • crictl
  • kubeadm

–£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ runc

‚óè –û–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

–≠—Ç–∞–ø—ã —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

  • –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π.
  • –ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è.
  • –ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤.
  • –°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • –ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞ –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • Bash
  • Cloud-init

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π

mkdir -p /etc/default/runc

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/default/runc/download.env
COMPONENT_VERSION="v1.1.12"
REPOSITORY="https://github.com/opencontainers/runc/releases/download"
EOF

–ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

cat <<"EOF" > /etc/default/runc/download-script.sh
#!/bin/bash
set -Eeuo pipefail


COMPONENT_VERSION="${COMPONENT_VERSION:-v1.1.12}"
REPOSITORY="${REPOSITORY:-https://github.com/opencontainers/runc/releases/download}"
PATH_BIN="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/runc.amd64"
PATH_SHA256="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/runc.sha256sum"
INSTALL_PATH="/usr/local/bin/runc"

LOG_TAG="runc-installer"
TMP_DIR="$(mktemp -d)"

logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Checking current runc version..."

CURRENT_VERSION=$($INSTALL_PATH --version 2>/dev/null | head -n1 | awk '{print $NF}') || CURRENT_VERSION="none"
COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN=$(echo "$COMPONENT_VERSION" | sed 's/^v//')

logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Current: $CURRENT_VERSION, Target: $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN"

if [[ "$CURRENT_VERSION" != "$COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN" ]]; then
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Download URL: $PATH_BIN"
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Updating runc to version $COMPONENT_VERSION..."

  cd "$TMP_DIR"
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Working directory: $PWD"

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading runc..."
  curl -fsSL -o runc.amd64 "$PATH_BIN" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download runc"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading checksum file..."
  curl -fsSL -o runc.sha256sum "$PATH_SHA256" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download checksum file"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Verifying checksum..."
  grep "runc.amd64" runc.sha256sum | sha256sum -c - || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Checksum verification failed!"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Installing runc..."
  install -m 755 runc.amd64 "$INSTALL_PATH"

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] runc successfully updated to $COMPONENT_VERSION."
  rm -rf "$TMP_DIR"

else
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] runc is already up to date. Skipping installation."
fi
EOF

–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤

chmod +x /etc/default/runc/download-script.sh

–°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

cat <<EOF > /usr/lib/systemd/system/runc-install.service
[Unit]
Description=Install and update in-cloud component runc
After=network.target
Wants=network-online.target

[Service]
Type=oneshot
EnvironmentFile=-/etc/default/runc/download.env
ExecStart=/bin/bash -c "/etc/default/runc/download-script.sh"
RemainAfterExit=yes

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

–ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

systemctl enable runc-install.service
systemctl start runc-install.service

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

- path: /etc/default/runc/download.env
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    COMPONENT_VERSION="v1.1.12"
    REPOSITORY="https://github.com/opencontainers/runc/releases/download"

–ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏/–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤

- path: /etc/default/runc/download-script.sh
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0755'
  content: |
    #!/bin/bash
    set -Eeuo pipefail
    
    
    COMPONENT_VERSION="${COMPONENT_VERSION:-v1.1.12}"
    REPOSITORY="${REPOSITORY:-https://github.com/opencontainers/runc/releases/download}"
    PATH_BIN="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/runc.amd64"
    PATH_SHA256="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/runc.sha256sum"
    INSTALL_PATH="/usr/local/bin/runc"
    
    LOG_TAG="runc-installer"
    TMP_DIR="$(mktemp -d)"
    
    logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Checking current runc version..."
    
    CURRENT_VERSION=$($INSTALL_PATH --version 2>/dev/null | head -n1 | awk '{print $NF}') || CURRENT_VERSION="none"
    COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN=$(echo "$COMPONENT_VERSION" | sed 's/^v//')
    
    logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Current: $CURRENT_VERSION, Target: $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN"
    
    if [[ "$CURRENT_VERSION" != "$COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN" ]]; then
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Download URL: $PATH_BIN"
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Updating runc to version $COMPONENT_VERSION..."
    
      cd "$TMP_DIR"
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Working directory: $PWD"
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading runc..."
      curl -fsSL -o runc.amd64 "$PATH_BIN" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download runc"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading checksum file..."
      curl -fsSL -o runc.sha256sum "$PATH_SHA256" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download checksum file"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Verifying checksum..."
      grep "runc.amd64" runc.sha256sum | sha256sum -c - || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Checksum verification failed!"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Installing runc..."
      install -m 755 runc.amd64 "$INSTALL_PATH"
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] runc successfully updated to $COMPONENT_VERSION."
      rm -rf "$TMP_DIR"
    
    else
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] runc is already up to date. Skipping installation."
    fi

–°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

- path: /usr/lib/systemd/system/runc-install.service
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    [Unit]
    Description=Install and update in-cloud component runc
    After=network.target
    Wants=network-online.target

    [Service]
    Type=oneshot
    EnvironmentFile=-/etc/default/runc/download.env
    ExecStart=/bin/bash -c "/etc/default/runc/download-script.sh"
    RemainAfterExit=yes

    [Install]
    WantedBy=multi-user.target

–ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

- systemctl enable runc-install.service
- systemctl start runc-install.service

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏

–ò—Å–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ–º—ã–µ —Ñ–∞–π–ª—ã

journalctl -t runc-installer
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
***** [INFO] Checking current runc version...
***** [INFO] Current: none, Target: v1.1.12
***** [INFO] Download URL: https://*******
***** [INFO] Updating runc to version v1.1.12...
***** [INFO] Working directory: /tmp/tmp.*****
***** [INFO] Downloading runc...
***** [INFO] Downloading checksum file...
***** [INFO] Verifying checksum...
***** [INFO] Installing runc...
***** [INFO] runc successfully updated to v1.1.12.
ls -la /usr/local/bin/ | grep 'runc$'
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
-rwxr-xr-x  1 root root  10709696 Jan 23  2024 runc

–í–µ—Ä—Å–∏—è –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ–º–æ–≥–æ —Ñ–∞–π–ª–∞

runc --version
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
runc version 1.1.12
commit: v1.1.12-0-g51d5e946
spec: 1.0.2-dev
go: go1.20.13
libseccomp: 2.5.4

–£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ containerd

‚óè –û–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

–≠—Ç–∞–ø—ã —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

  • –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π.
  • –ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è.
  • –ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤.
  • –°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • –ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞ –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • Bash
  • Cloud-init

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π

mkdir -p /etc/default/containerd

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/default/containerd/download.env
COMPONENT_VERSION="1.7.19"
REPOSITORY="https://github.com/containerd/containerd/releases/download"
EOF

–ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

cat <<"EOF" > /etc/default/containerd/download-script.sh
#!/bin/bash
set -Eeuo pipefail


COMPONENT_VERSION="${COMPONENT_VERSION:-1.7.19}"
REPOSITORY="${REPOSITORY:-https://github.com/containerd/containerd/releases/download}"
PATH_BIN="${REPOSITORY}/v${COMPONENT_VERSION}/containerd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz"
PATH_SHA256="${REPOSITORY}/v${COMPONENT_VERSION}/containerd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz.sha256sum"
INSTALL_PATH="/usr/local/bin/"


LOG_TAG="containerd-installer"
TMP_DIR="$(mktemp -d)"

logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Checking current containerd version..."

CURRENT_VERSION=$($INSTALL_PATH/containerd --version 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $3}' | sed 's/v//') || CURRENT_VERSION="none"
COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN=$(echo "$COMPONENT_VERSION" | sed 's/^v//')

logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Current: $CURRENT_VERSION, Target: $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN"

if [[ "$CURRENT_VERSION" != "$COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN" ]]; then
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Download URL: $PATH_BIN"
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Updating containerd to version $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN..."

  cd "$TMP_DIR"
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Working directory: $PWD"

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading containerd..."
  curl -fsSL -o "containerd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz" "$PATH_BIN" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download containerd"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading checksum file..."
  curl -fsSL -o "containerd.sha256sum" "$PATH_SHA256" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download checksum file"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Verifying checksum..."
  sha256sum -c containerd.sha256sum | grep 'OK' || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Checksum verification failed!"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Extracting files..."
  tar -C "$TMP_DIR" -xvf "containerd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz"

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Installing binaries..."
  install -m 755 "$TMP_DIR/bin/containerd" $INSTALL_PATH
  install -m 755 "$TMP_DIR/bin/containerd-shim"* $INSTALL_PATH
  install -m 755 "$TMP_DIR/bin/ctr" $INSTALL_PATH

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Containerd successfully updated to $COMPONENT_VERSION."
  rm -rf "$TMP_DIR"

else
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Containerd is already up to date. Skipping installation."
fi
EOF

–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤

chmod +x /etc/default/containerd/download-script.sh

–°–µ—Ä–≤␀–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

cat <<EOF > /usr/lib/systemd/system/containerd-install.service
[Unit]
Description=Install and update in-cloud component containerd
After=network.target
Wants=network-online.target

[Service]
Type=oneshot
EnvironmentFile=-/etc/default/containerd/download.env
ExecStart=/bin/bash -c "/etc/default/containerd/download-script.sh"
RemainAfterExit=yes

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

–ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞ –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

systemctl enable containerd-install.service
systemctl start containerd-install.service

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

- path: /etc/default/containerd/download.env
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    COMPONENT_VERSION="1.7.19"
    REPOSITORY="https://github.com/containerd/containerd/releases/download"

–ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏/–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤

- path: /etc/default/containerd/download-script.sh
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0755'
  content: |
    #!/bin/bash
    set -Eeuo pipefail
    
    
    COMPONENT_VERSION="${COMPONENT_VERSION:-1.7.19}"
    REPOSITORY="${REPOSITORY:-https://github.com/containerd/containerd/releases/download}"
    PATH_BIN="${REPOSITORY}/v${COMPONENT_VERSION}/containerd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz"
    PATH_SHA256="${REPOSITORY}/v${COMPONENT_VERSION}/containerd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz.sha256sum"
    INSTALL_PATH="/usr/local/bin/"
    
    
    LOG_TAG="containerd-installer"
    TMP_DIR="$(mktemp -d)"
    
    logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Checking current containerd version..."
    
    CURRENT_VERSION=$($INSTALL_PATH/containerd --version 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $3}' | sed 's/v//') || CURRENT_VERSION="none"
    COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN=$(echo "$COMPONENT_VERSION" | sed 's/^v//')
    
    logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Current: $CURRENT_VERSION, Target: $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN"
    
    if [[ "$CURRENT_VERSION" != "$COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN" ]]; then
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Download URL: $PATH_BIN"
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Updating containerd to version $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN..."
    
      cd "$TMP_DIR"
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Working directory: $PWD"
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading containerd..."
      curl -fsSL -o "containerd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz" "$PATH_BIN" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download containerd"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading checksum file..."
      curl -fsSL -o "containerd.sha256sum" "$PATH_SHA256" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download checksum file"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Verifying checksum..."
      sha256sum -c containerd.sha256sum | grep 'OK' || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Checksum verification failed!"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Extracting files..."
      tar -C "$TMP_DIR" -xvf "containerd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz"
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Installing binaries..."
      install -m 755 "$TMP_DIR/bin/containerd" $INSTALL_PATH
      install -m 755 "$TMP_DIR/bin/containerd-shim"* $INSTALL_PATH
      install -m 755 "$TMP_DIR/bin/ctr" $INSTALL_PATH
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Containerd successfully updated to $COMPONENT_VERSION."
      rm -rf "$TMP_DIR"
    
    else
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Containerd is already up to date. Skipping installation."
    fi

–°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

- path: /usr/lib/systemd/system/containerd-install.service
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    [Unit]
    Description=Install and update in-cloud component containerd
    After=network.target
    Wants=network-online.target

    [Service]
    Type=oneshot
    EnvironmentFile=-/etc/default/containerd/download.env
    ExecStart=/bin/bash -c "/etc/default/containerd/download-script.sh"
    RemainAfterExit=yes

    [Install]
    WantedBy=multi-user.target

–ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞ –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

- systemctl enable containerd-install.service
- systemctl start containerd-install.service

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏

–ò—Å–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ–º—ã–µ —Ñ–∞–π–ª—ã

journalctl -t containerd-installer
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
***** [INFO] Checking current containerd version...
***** [INFO] Current: none, Target: 1.7.19
***** [INFO] Download URL: https://*******
***** [INFO] Updating containerd to version 1.7.19...
***** [INFO] Working directory: /tmp/tmp.*****
***** [INFO] Downloading containerd...
***** [INFO] Downloading checksum file...
***** [INFO] Verifying checksum...
***** [INFO] Extracting files...
***** [INFO] Installing binaries...
***** [INFO] Containerd successfully updated to 1.7.19.
ls -la /usr/local/bin/ | grep -E "containerd|ctr"
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
-rwxr-xr-x  1 root root  54855296 Feb 18 15:12 containerd
-rwxr-xr-x  1 root root   7176192 Feb 18 15:12 containerd-shim
-rwxr-xr-x  1 root root   8884224 Feb 18 15:12 containerd-shim-containerd-v1
-rwxr-xr-x  1 root root  12169216 Feb 18 15:12 containerd-shim-containerd-v2
-rwxr-xr-x  1 root root  12169216 Feb 18 15:12 ctr

–í–µ—Ä—Å–∏—è –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ–º–æ–≥–æ —Ñ–∞–π–ª–∞

containerd --version
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
containerd github.com/containerd/containerd v1.7.19 2bf793ef6dc9a18e00cb12efb64355c2c9d5eb41

–£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ kubelet

‚óè –û–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

–≠—Ç–∞–ø—ã —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

  • –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π.
  • –ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è.
  • –ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤.
  • –°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • –ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞ –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • Bash
  • Cloud-init

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π

mkdir -p /etc/default/kubelet

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/default/kubelet/download.env
COMPONENT_VERSION="v1.30.4"
REPOSITORY="https://dl.k8s.io"
EOF

–ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

cat <<"EOF" > /etc/default/kubelet/download-script.sh
#!/bin/bash
set -Eeuo pipefail


COMPONENT_VERSION="${COMPONENT_VERSION:-v1.30.4}"
REPOSITORY="${REPOSITORY:-https://dl.k8s.io}"
PATH_BIN="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/bin/linux/amd64/kubelet"
PATH_SHA256="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/bin/linux/amd64/kubelet.sha256"
INSTALL_PATH="/usr/local/bin/kubelet"


LOG_TAG="kubelet-installer"
TMP_DIR="$(mktemp -d)"

logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Checking current kubelet version..."

CURRENT_VERSION=$($INSTALL_PATH --version 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $2}' | sed 's/v//') || CURRENT_VERSION="none"
COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN=$(echo "$COMPONENT_VERSION" | sed 's/^v//')

logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Current: $CURRENT_VERSION, Target: $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN"

if [[ "$CURRENT_VERSION" != "$COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN" ]]; then
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Download URL: $PATH_BIN"
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Updating kubelet to version $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN..."

  cd "$TMP_DIR"
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Working directory: $PWD"

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading kubelet..."
  curl -fsSL -o kubelet "$PATH_BIN" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download kubelet"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading checksum file..."
  curl -fsSL -o kubelet.sha256sum "$PATH_SHA256" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download checksum file"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Verifying checksum..."
  awk '{print $1"  kubelet"}' kubelet.sha256sum | sha256sum -c - || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Checksum verification failed!"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Installing kubelet..."
  install -m 755 kubelet "$INSTALL_PATH"

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] kubelet successfully updated to $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN."
  rm -rf "$TMP_DIR"

else
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] kubelet is already up to date. Skipping installation."
fi
EOF

–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤

chmod +x /etc/default/kubelet/download-script.sh

–°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

cat <<EOF > /usr/lib/systemd/system/kubelet-install.service
[Unit]
Description=Install and update kubelet
After=network.target
Wants=network-online.target

[Service]
Type=oneshot
EnvironmentFile=-/etc/default/kubelet/download.env
ExecStart=/bin/bash -c "/etc/default/kubelet/download-script.sh"
RemainAfterExit=yes

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

–ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞

systemctl enable kubelet-install.service
systemctl start kubelet-install.service

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

- path: /etc/default/kubelet/download.env
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    COMPONENT_VERSION="v1.30.4"
    REPOSITORY="https://dl.k8s.io"

–ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏/–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤

- path: /etc/default/kubelet/download-script.sh
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0755'
  content: |
    #!/bin/bash
    set -Eeuo pipefail
    
    
    COMPONENT_VERSION="${COMPONENT_VERSION:-v1.30.4}"
    REPOSITORY="${REPOSITORY:-https://dl.k8s.io}"
    PATH_BIN="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/bin/linux/amd64/kubelet"
    PATH_SHA256="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/bin/linux/amd64/kubelet.sha256"
    INSTALL_PATH="/usr/local/bin/kubelet"
    
    
    LOG_TAG="kubelet-installer"
    TMP_DIR="$(mktemp -d)"
    
    logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Checking current kubelet version..."
    
    CURRENT_VERSION=$($INSTALL_PATH --version 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $2}' | sed 's/v//') || CURRENT_VERSION="none"
    COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN=$(echo "$COMPONENT_VERSION" | sed 's/^v//')
    
    logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Current: $CURRENT_VERSION, Target: $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN"
    
    if [[ "$CURRENT_VERSION" != "$COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN" ]]; then
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Download URL: $PATH_BIN"
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Updating kubelet to version $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN..."
    
      cd "$TMP_DIR"
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Working directory: $PWD"
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading kubelet..."
      curl -fsSL -o kubelet "$PATH_BIN" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download kubelet"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading checksum file..."
      curl -fsSL -o kubelet.sha256sum "$PATH_SHA256" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download checksum file"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Verifying checksum..."
      awk '{print $1"  kubelet"}' kubelet.sha256sum | sha256sum -c - || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Checksum verification failed!"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Installing kubelet..."
      install -m 755 kubelet "$INSTALL_PATH"
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] kubelet successfully updated to $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN."
      rm -rf "$TMP_DIR"
    
    else
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] kubelet is already up to date. Skipping installation."
    fi

–°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

- path: /usr/lib/systemd/system/kubelet-install.service
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    [Unit]
    Description=Install and update kubelet
    After=network.target
    Wants=network-online.target

    [Service]
    Type=oneshot
    EnvironmentFile=-/etc/default/kubelet/download.env
    ExecStart=/bin/bash -c "/etc/default/kubelet/download-script.sh"
    RemainAfterExit=yes

    [Install]
    WantedBy=multi-user.target

–ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞

- systemctl enable kubelet-install.service
- systemctl start kubelet-install.service

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏
journalctl -t kubelet-installer
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
***** [INFO] Checking current kubelet version...
***** [INFO] Current: none, Target: v1.30.4
***** [INFO] Download URL: https://*******
***** [INFO] Updating kubelet to version v1.30.4...
***** [INFO] Working directory: /tmp/tmp.*****
***** [INFO] Downloading kubelet...
***** [INFO] Downloading checksum file...
***** [INFO] Verifying checksum...
***** [INFO] Installing kubelet...
***** [INFO] kubelet successfully updated to v1.30.4.
ls -la /usr/local/bin/ | grep 'kubelet$'
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
-rwxr-xr-x  1 root root 100125080 Aug 14  2024 kubelet
kubelet --version
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
Kubernetes v1.30.4

–£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ etcd

‚óè –û–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

–≠—Ç–∞–ø—ã —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

  • –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π.
  • –ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è.
  • –ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤.
  • –°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • –ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞ –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • Bash
  • Cloud-init

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π

mkdir -p /etc/default/etcd

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/default/etcd/download.env
COMPONENT_VERSION="v3.5.12"
REPOSITORY="https://github.com/etcd-io/etcd/releases/download"
EOF

–ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

cat <<"EOF" > /etc/default/etcd/download-script.sh
#!/bin/bash
set -Eeuo pipefail


COMPONENT_VERSION="${COMPONENT_VERSION:-v3.5.12}"
REPOSITORY="${REPOSITORY:-https://github.com/etcd-io/etcd/releases/download}"
PATH_BIN="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/etcd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz"
PATH_SHA256="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/SHA256SUMS"
INSTALL_PATH="/usr/local/bin/"


LOG_TAG="etcd-installer"
TMP_DIR="$(mktemp -d)"

logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Checking current etcd version..."

CURRENT_VERSION=$($INSTALL_PATH/etcd --version 2>/dev/null | grep 'etcd Version:' | awk '{print $3}' | sed 's/v//') || CURRENT_VERSION="none"
COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN=$(echo "$COMPONENT_VERSION" | sed 's/^v//')

logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Current: $CURRENT_VERSION, Target: $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN"

if [[ "$CURRENT_VERSION" != "$COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN" ]]; then
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Download URL: $PATH_BIN"
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Updating etcd to version $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN..."

  cd "$TMP_DIR"
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Working directory: $PWD"

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading etcd..."
  curl -fsSL -o "etcd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz" "$PATH_BIN" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download etcd"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading checksum file..."
  curl -fsSL -o "etcd.sha256sum" "$PATH_SHA256" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download checksum file"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Verifying checksum..."
  grep "etcd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz" etcd.sha256sum | sha256sum -c - || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Checksum verification failed!"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Extracting files..."
  tar -C "$TMP_DIR" -xvf "etcd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz"

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Installing binaries..."
  install -m 755 "$TMP_DIR/etcd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64/etcd" $INSTALL_PATH
  install -m 755 "$TMP_DIR/etcd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64/etcdctl" $INSTALL_PATH
  install -m 755 "$TMP_DIR/etcd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64/etcdutl" $INSTALL_PATH

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] etcd successfully updated to $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN."
  rm -rf "$TMP_DIR"

else
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] etcd is already up to date. Skipping installation."
fi
EOF

–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤

chmod +x /etc/default/etcd/download-script.sh

–°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

cat <<EOF > /usr/lib/systemd/system/etcd-install.service
[Unit]
Description=Install and update in-cloud component etcd
After=network.target
Wants=network-online.target

[Service]
Type=oneshot
EnvironmentFile=-/etc/default/etcd/download.env
ExecStart=/bin/bash -c "/etc/default/etcd/download-script.sh"
RemainAfterExit=yes

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

–ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞

systemctl enable etcd-install.service
systemctl start etcd-install.service

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

#write_files:
- path: /etc/default/etcd/download.env
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    COMPONENT_VERSION="v3.5.12"
    REPOSITORY="https://github.com/etcd-io/etcd/releases/download"

–ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

- path: /etc/default/etcd/download-script.sh
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0755'
  content: |
    #!/bin/bash
    set -Eeuo pipefail
    
    
    COMPONENT_VERSION="${COMPONENT_VERSION:-v3.5.12}"
    REPOSITORY="${REPOSITORY:-https://github.com/etcd-io/etcd/releases/download}"
    PATH_BIN="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/etcd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz"
    PATH_SHA256="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/SHA256SUMS"
    INSTALL_PATH="/usr/local/bin/"
    
    
    LOG_TAG="etcd-installer"
    TMP_DIR="$(mktemp -d)"
    
    logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Checking current etcd version..."
    
    CURRENT_VERSION=$($INSTALL_PATH/etcd --version 2>/dev/null | grep 'etcd Version:' | awk '{print $3}' | sed 's/v//') || CURRENT_VERSION="none"
    COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN=$(echo "$COMPONENT_VERSION" | sed 's/^v//')
    
    logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Current: $CURRENT_VERSION, Target: $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN"
    
    if [[ "$CURRENT_VERSION" != "$COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN" ]]; then
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Download URL: $PATH_BIN"
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Updating etcd to version $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN..."
    
      cd "$TMP_DIR"
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Working directory: $PWD"
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading etcd..."
      curl -fsSL -o "etcd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz" "$PATH_BIN" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download etcd"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading checksum file..."
      curl -fsSL -o "etcd.sha256sum" "$PATH_SHA256" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download checksum file"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Verifying checksum..."
      grep "etcd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz" etcd.sha256sum | sha256sum -c - || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Checksum verification failed!"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Extracting files..."
      tar -C "$TMP_DIR" -xvf "etcd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz"
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Installing binaries..."
      install -m 755 "$TMP_DIR/etcd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64/etcd" $INSTALL_PATH
      install -m 755 "$TMP_DIR/etcd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64/etcdctl" $INSTALL_PATH
      install -m 755 "$TMP_DIR/etcd-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64/etcdutl" $INSTALL_PATH
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] etcd successfully updated to $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN."
      rm -rf "$TMP_DIR"
    
    else
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] etcd is already up to date. Skipping installation."
    fi

–°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

- path: /usr/lib/systemd/system/etcd-install.service
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    [Unit]
    Description=Install and update in-cloud component etcd
    After=network.target
    Wants=network-online.target

    [Service]
    Type=oneshot
    EnvironmentFile=-/etc/default/etcd/download.env
    ExecStart=/bin/bash -c "/etc/default/etcd/download-script.sh"
    RemainAfterExit=yes

    [Install]
    WantedBy=multi-user.target

–ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞

- systemctl enable etcd-install.service
- systemctl start etcd-install.service

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏
journalctl -t etcd-installer
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
***** [INFO] Checking current etcd version...
***** [INFO] Current: none, Target: 3.5.12-0
***** [INFO] Download URL: https://*******
***** [INFO] Updating etcd to version 3.5.12-0...
***** [INFO] Working directory: /tmp/tmp.*****
***** [INFO] Downloading etcd...
***** [INFO] Downloading checksum file...
***** [INFO] Verifying checksum...
***** [INFO] Installing etcd...
***** [INFO] etcd successfully updated to 3.5.12-0.
ls -la /usr/local/bin/ | grep 'etcd'
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
-rwxr-xr-x  1 root root  23760896 Mar 29 16:21 etcd
-rwxr-xr-x  1 root root  17960960 Mar 29 16:21 etcdctl
-rwxr-xr-x  1 root root  16031744 Mar 29 16:21 etcdutl
etcd --version
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
etcd Version: 3.5.5
Git SHA: 19002cfc6
Go Version: go1.16.15
Go OS/Arch: linux/amd64

–£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ kubectl

‚óè –ù–µ –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

–≠—Ç–∞–ø—ã —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

  • –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π.
  • –ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è.
  • –ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤.
  • –°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • –ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞ –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • Bash
  • Cloud-init

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π

mkdir -p /etc/default/kubectl

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/default/kubectl/download.env
COMPONENT_VERSION="v1.30.4"
REPOSITORY="https://dl.k8s.io"
EOF

–ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

cat <<"EOF" > /etc/default/kubectl/download-script.sh
#!/bin/bash
set -Eeuo pipefail


COMPONENT_VERSION="${COMPONENT_VERSION:-v1.30.4}"
REPOSITORY="${REPOSITORY:-https://dl.k8s.io}"
PATH_BIN="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/bin/linux/amd64/kubectl"
PATH_SHA256="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/bin/linux/amd64/kubectl.sha256"
INSTALL_PATH="/usr/local/bin/kubectl"


LOG_TAG="kubectl-installer"
TMP_DIR="$(mktemp -d)"

logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Checking current kubectl version..."

CURRENT_VERSION=$($INSTALL_PATH version -o json --client=true 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.clientVersion.gitVersion' | sed 's/^v//') || CURRENT_VERSION="none"
COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN=$(echo "$COMPONENT_VERSION" | sed 's/^v//')

logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Current: $CURRENT_VERSION, Target: $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN"

if [[ "$CURRENT_VERSION" != "$COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN" ]]; then
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Download URL: $PATH_BIN"
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Updating kubectl to version $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN..."

  cd "$TMP_DIR"
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Working directory: $PWD"

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading kubectl..."
  curl -fsSL -o kubectl "$PATH_BIN" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download kubectl"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading checksum file..."
  curl -fsSL -o kubectl.sha256sum "$PATH_SHA256" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download checksum file"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Verifying checksum..."
  awk '{print $1"  kubectl"}' kubectl.sha256sum | sha256sum -c - || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Checksum verification failed!"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Installing kubectl..."
  install -m 755 kubectl "$INSTALL_PATH"

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] kubectl successfully updated to $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN."
  rm -rf "$TMP_DIR"

else
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] kubectl is already up to date. Skipping installation."
fi
EOF

–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤

chmod +x /etc/default/kubectl/download-script.sh

–°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

cat <<EOF > /usr/lib/systemd/system/kubectl-install.service
[Unit]
Description=Install and update kubectl
After=network.target
Wants=network-online.target

[Service]
Type=oneshot
EnvironmentFile=-/etc/default/kubectl/download.env
ExecStart=/bin/bash -c "/etc/default/kubectl/download-script.sh"
RemainAfterExit=yes

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

–ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞

systemctl enable kubectl-install.service
systemctl start kubectl-install.service

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

- path: /etc/default/kubectl/download.env
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    COMPONENT_VERSION="v1.30.4"
    REPOSITORY="https://dl.k8s.io"

–ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏/–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤

- path: /etc/default/kubectl/download-script.sh
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0755'
  content: |
    #!/bin/bash
    set -Eeuo pipefail
    
    
    COMPONENT_VERSION="${COMPONENT_VERSION:-v1.30.4}"
    REPOSITORY="${REPOSITORY:-https://dl.k8s.io}"
    PATH_BIN="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/bin/linux/amd64/kubectl"
    PATH_SHA256="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/bin/linux/amd64/kubectl.sha256"
    INSTALL_PATH="/usr/local/bin/kubectl"
    
    
    LOG_TAG="kubectl-installer"
    TMP_DIR="$(mktemp -d)"
    
    logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Checking current kubectl version..."
    
    CURRENT_VERSION=$($INSTALL_PATH version -o json --client=true 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.clientVersion.gitVersion' | sed 's/^v//') || CURRENT_VERSION="none"
    COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN=$(echo "$COMPONENT_VERSION" | sed 's/^v//')
    
    logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Current: $CURRENT_VERSION, Target: $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN"
    
    if [[ "$CURRENT_VERSION" != "$COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN" ]]; then
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Download URL: $PATH_BIN"
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Updating kubectl to version $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN..."
    
      cd "$TMP_DIR"
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Working directory: $PWD"
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading kubectl..."
      curl -fsSL -o kubectl "$PATH_BIN" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download kubectl"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading checksum file..."
      curl -fsSL -o kubectl.sha256sum "$PATH_SHA256" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download checksum file"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Verifying checksum..."
      awk '{print $1"  kubectl"}' kubectl.sha256sum | sha256sum -c - || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Checksum verification failed!"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Installing kubectl..."
      install -m 755 kubectl "$INSTALL_PATH"
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] kubectl successfully updated to $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN."
      rm -rf "$TMP_DIR"
    
    else
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] kubectl is already up to date. Skipping installation."
    fi

–°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

- path: /usr/lib/systemd/system/kubectl-install.service
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    [Unit]
    Description=Install and update kubectl
    After=network.target
    Wants=network-online.target

    [Service]
    Type=oneshot
    EnvironmentFile=-/etc/default/kubectl/download.env
    ExecStart=/bin/bash -c "/etc/default/kubectl/download-script.sh"
    RemainAfterExit=yes

    [Install]
    WantedBy=multi-user.target

–ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞

- systemctl enable kubectl-install.service
- systemctl start kubectl-install.service

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏

–ò—Å–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ–º—ã–µ —Ñ–∞–π–ª—ã

journalctl -t kubectl-installer
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã

***** [INFO] Current: none, Target: v1.30.4
***** [INFO] Download URL: https://*******
***** [INFO] Updating kubectl to version v1.30.4...
***** [INFO] Working directory: /tmp/tmp.*****
***** [INFO] Downloading kubectl...
***** [INFO] Downloading checksum file...
***** [INFO] Verifying checksum...
***** [INFO] Installing kubectl...
***** [INFO] kubectl successfully updated to v1.30.4.
ls -la /usr/local/bin/ | grep 'kubectl$'
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
-rwxr-xr-x  1 root root  51454104 Aug 14  2024 kubectl

–í–µ—Ä—Å–∏—è –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ–º–æ–≥–æ —Ñ–∞–π–ª–∞

kubectl  version
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã

Kustomize Version: v5.0.4-0.20230601165947-6ce0bf390ce3

–£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ crictl

‚óè –ù–µ –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

–≠—Ç–∞–ø—ã —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

  • –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π.
  • –ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è.
  • –ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤.
  • –°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • –ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞ –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • Bash
  • Cloud-init

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π

mkdir -p /etc/default/crictl

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/default/crictl/download.env
COMPONENT_VERSION="v1.30.0"
REPOSITORY="https://github.com/kubernetes-sigs/cri-tools/releases/download"
EOF

–ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

cat <<"EOF" > /etc/default/crictl/download-script.sh
#!/bin/bash
set -Eeuo pipefail


COMPONENT_VERSION="${COMPONENT_VERSION:-v1.30.0}"
REPOSITORY="${REPOSITORY:-https://github.com/kubernetes-sigs/cri-tools/releases/download}"
PATH_BIN="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/crictl-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz"
PATH_SHA256="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/crictl-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz.sha256"
INSTALL_PATH="/usr/local/bin/crictl"


LOG_TAG="crictl-installer"
TMP_DIR="$(mktemp -d)"

logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Checking current crictl version..."

CURRENT_VERSION=$($INSTALL_PATH --version 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $3}' | sed 's/v//') || CURRENT_VERSION="none"
COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN=$(echo "$COMPONENT_VERSION" | sed 's/^v//')

logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Current: $CURRENT_VERSION, Target: $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN"

if [[ "$CURRENT_VERSION" != "$COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN" ]]; then
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Download URL: $PATH_BIN"
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Updating crictl to version $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN..."

  cd "$TMP_DIR"
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Working directory: $PWD"

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading crictl..."
  curl -fsSL -o crictl.tar.gz "$PATH_BIN" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download crictl"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading checksum file..."
  curl -fsSL -o crictl.sha256sum "$PATH_SHA256" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download checksum file"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Verifying checksum..."
  awk '{print $1"  crictl.tar.gz"}' crictl.sha256sum | sha256sum -c - || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Checksum verification failed!"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Extracting files..."
  tar -C "$TMP_DIR" -xvf crictl.tar.gz

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Installing crictl..."
  install -m 755 "$TMP_DIR/crictl" "$INSTALL_PATH"

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] crictl successfully updated to $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN."
  rm -rf "$TMP_DIR"

else
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] crictl is already up to date. Skipping installation."
fi
EOF

–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤

chmod +x /etc/default/crictl/download-script.sh

–°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

cat <<EOF > /usr/lib/systemd/system/crictl-install.service
[Unit]
Description=Install and update in-cloud component crictl
After=network.target
Wants=network-online.target

[Service]
Type=oneshot
EnvironmentFile=-/etc/default/crictl/download.env
ExecStart=/bin/bash -c "/etc/default/crictl/download-script.sh"
RemainAfterExit=yes

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

–ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞

systemctl enable crictl-install.service
systemctl start crictl-install.service

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

- path: /etc/default/crictl/download.env
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    COMPONENT_VERSION="v1.30.0"
    REPOSITORY="https://github.com/kubernetes-sigs/cri-tools/releases/download"

–ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏/–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä␀–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤

- path: /etc/default/crictl/download-script.sh
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0755'
  content: |
    #!/bin/bash
    set -Eeuo pipefail
    
    
    COMPONENT_VERSION="${COMPONENT_VERSION:-v1.30.0}"
    REPOSITORY="${REPOSITORY:-https://github.com/kubernetes-sigs/cri-tools/releases/download}"
    PATH_BIN="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/crictl-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz"
    PATH_SHA256="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/crictl-${COMPONENT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz.sha256"
    INSTALL_PATH="/usr/local/bin/crictl"
    
    
    LOG_TAG="crictl-installer"
    TMP_DIR="$(mktemp -d)"
    
    logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Checking current crictl version..."
    
    CURRENT_VERSION=$($INSTALL_PATH --version 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $3}' | sed 's/v//') || CURRENT_VERSION="none"
    COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN=$(echo "$COMPONENT_VERSION" | sed 's/^v//')
    
    logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Current: $CURRENT_VERSION, Target: $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN"
    
    if [[ "$CURRENT_VERSION" != "$COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN" ]]; then
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Download URL: $PATH_BIN"
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Updating crictl to version $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN..."
    
      cd "$TMP_DIR"
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Working directory: $PWD"
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading crictl..."
      curl -fsSL -o crictl.tar.gz "$PATH_BIN" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download crictl"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading checksum file..."
      curl -fsSL -o crictl.sha256sum "$PATH_SHA256" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download checksum file"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Verifying checksum..."
      awk '{print $1"  crictl.tar.gz"}' crictl.sha256sum | sha256sum -c - || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Checksum verification failed!"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Extracting files..."
      tar -C "$TMP_DIR" -xvf crictl.tar.gz
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Installing crictl..."
      install -m 755 "$TMP_DIR/crictl" "$INSTALL_PATH"
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] crictl successfully updated to $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN."
      rm -rf "$TMP_DIR"
    
    else
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] crictl is already up to date. Skipping installation."
    fi

–°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É␀–∑–∫–∏

- path: /usr/lib/systemd/system/crictl-install.service
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    [Unit]
    Description=Install and update in-cloud component crictl
    After=network.target
    Wants=network-online.target

    [Service]
    Type=oneshot
    EnvironmentFile=-/etc/default/crictl/download.env
    ExecStart=/bin/bash -c "/etc/default/crictl/download-script.sh"
    RemainAfterExit=yes

    [Install]
    WantedBy=multi-user.target

–ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞

- systemctl enable crictl-install.service
- systemctl start crictl-install.service

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏
journalctl -t crictl-installer
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
***** [INFO] Checking current crictl version...
***** [INFO] Current: none, Target: v1.30.0
***** [INFO] Download URL: https://*******
***** [INFO] Updating crictl to version v1.30.0...
***** [INFO] Working directory: /tmp/tmp.*****
***** [INFO] Downloading crictl...
***** [INFO] Downloading checksum file...
***** [INFO] Verifying checksum...
***** [INFO] Installing crictl...
***** [INFO] crictl successfully updated to v1.30.0.
ls -la /usr/local/bin/ | grep 'crictl$'
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
-rwxr-xr-x  1 1001  127  58376628 Apr 18  2024 crictl
crictl --version
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
crictl version v1.30.0

–£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ kubeadm

‚óè –ù–µ –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

–≠—Ç–∞–ø—ã —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

  • –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π.
  • –ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è.
  • –ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤.
  • –°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • –ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞ –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
  • Bash
  • Cloud-init

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π

mkdir -p /etc/default/kubeadm

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/default/kubeadm/download.env
COMPONENT_VERSION="v1.30.4"
REPOSITORY="https://dl.k8s.io"
EOF

–ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

cat <<"EOF" > /etc/default/kubeadm/download-script.sh
#!/bin/bash
set -Eeuo pipefail


COMPONENT_VERSION="${COMPONENT_VERSION:-v1.30.4}"
REPOSITORY="${REPOSITORY:-https://dl.k8s.io}"
PATH_BIN="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/bin/linux/amd64/kubeadm"
PATH_SHA256="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/bin/linux/amd64/kubeadm.sha256"
INSTALL_PATH="/usr/local/bin/kubeadm"


LOG_TAG="kubeadm-installer"
TMP_DIR="$(mktemp -d)"

logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Checking current kubeadm version..."

CURRENT_VERSION=$($INSTALL_PATH version -o json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.clientVersion.gitVersion' | sed 's/^v//') || CURRENT_VERSION="none"
COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN=$(echo "$COMPONENT_VERSION" | sed 's/^v//')

logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Current: $CURRENT_VERSION, Target: $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN"

if [[ "$CURRENT_VERSION" != "$COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN" ]]; then
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Download URL: $PATH_BIN"
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Updating kubeadm to version $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN..."

  cd "$TMP_DIR"
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Working directory: $PWD"

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading kubeadm..."
  curl -fsSL -o kubeadm "$PATH_BIN" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download kubeadm"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading checksum file..."
  curl -fsSL -o kubeadm.sha256sum "$PATH_SHA256" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download checksum file"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Verifying checksum..."
  awk '{print $1"  kubeadm"}' kubeadm.sha256sum | sha256sum -c - || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Checksum verification failed!"; exit 1; }

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Installing kubeadm..."
  install -m 755 kubeadm "$INSTALL_PATH"

  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] kubeadm successfully updated to $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN."
  rm -rf "$TMP_DIR"

else
  logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] kubeadm is already up to date. Skipping installation."
fi
EOF

–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤

chmod +x /etc/default/kubeadm/download-script.sh

–°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

cat <<EOF > /usr/lib/systemd/system/kubeadm-install.service
[Unit]
Description=Install and update kubeadm
After=network.target
Wants=network-online.target

[Service]
Type=oneshot
EnvironmentFile=-/etc/default/kubeadm/download.env
ExecStart=/bin/bash -c "/etc/default/kubeadm/download-script.sh"
RemainAfterExit=yes

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

–ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞

systemctl enable kubeadm-install.service
systemctl start kubeadm-install.service

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

- path: /etc/default/kubeadm/download.env
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    COMPONENT_VERSION="v1.30.4"
    REPOSITORY="https://dl.k8s.io"

–ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞␀–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏/–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤

- path: /etc/default/kubeadm/download-script.sh
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0755'
  content: |
    #!/bin/bash
    set -Eeuo pipefail
    
    
    COMPONENT_VERSION="${COMPONENT_VERSION:-v1.30.4}"
    REPOSITORY="${REPOSITORY:-https://dl.k8s.io}"
    PATH_BIN="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/bin/linux/amd64/kubeadm"
    PATH_SHA256="${REPOSITORY}/${COMPONENT_VERSION}/bin/linux/amd64/kubeadm.sha256"
    INSTALL_PATH="/usr/local/bin/kubeadm"
    
    
    LOG_TAG="kubeadm-installer"
    TMP_DIR="$(mktemp -d)"
    
    logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Checking current kubeadm version..."
    
    CURRENT_VERSION=$($INSTALL_PATH version -o json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.clientVersion.gitVersion' | sed 's/^v//') || CURRENT_VERSION="none"
    COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN=$(echo "$COMPONENT_VERSION" | sed 's/^v//')
    
    logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Current: $CURRENT_VERSION, Target: $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN"
    
    if [[ "$CURRENT_VERSION" != "$COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN" ]]; then
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Download URL: $PATH_BIN"
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Updating kubeadm to version $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN..."
    
      cd "$TMP_DIR"
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Working directory: $PWD"
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading kubeadm..."
      curl -fsSL -o kubeadm "$PATH_BIN" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download kubeadm"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Downloading checksum file..."
      curl -fsSL -o kubeadm.sha256sum "$PATH_SHA256" || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Failed to download checksum file"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Verifying checksum..."
      awk '{print $1"  kubeadm"}' kubeadm.sha256sum | sha256sum -c - || { logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[ERROR] Checksum verification failed!"; exit 1; }
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] Installing kubeadm..."
      install -m 755 kubeadm "$INSTALL_PATH"
    
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] kubeadm successfully updated to $COMPONENT_VERSION_CLEAN."
      rm -rf "$TMP_DIR"
    
    else
      logger -t "$LOG_TAG" "[INFO] kubeadm is already up to date. Skipping installation."
    fi

–°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

- path: /usr/lib/systemd/system/kubeadm-install.service
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    [Unit]
    Description=Install and update kubeadm
    After=network.target
    Wants=network-online.target

    [Service]
    Type=oneshot
    EnvironmentFile=-/etc/default/kubeadm/download.env
    ExecStart=/bin/bash -c "/etc/default/kubeadm/download-script.sh"
    RemainAfterExit=yes

    [Install]
    WantedBy=multi-user.target

–ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞

- systemctl enable kubeadm-install.service
- systemctl start kubeadm-install.service

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏
journalctl -t kubeadm-installer
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
***** [INFO] Checking current kubeadm version...
***** [INFO] Current: none, Target: v1.30.4
***** [INFO] Download URL: https://*******
***** [INFO] Updating kubeadm to version v1.30.4...
***** [INFO] Working directory: /tmp/tmp.*****
***** [INFO] Downloading kubeadm...
***** [INFO] Downloading checksum file...
***** [INFO] Verifying checksum...
***** [INFO] Extracting files...
***** [INFO] Installing binaries...
***** [INFO] kubeadm successfully updated to v1.30.4.
ls -la /usr/local/bin/ | grep 'kubeadm$'
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã:::info

kubeadm version
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
kubeadm version: &version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"30", GitVersion:"v1.30.4", GitCommit:"a51b3b711150f57ffc1f526a640ec058514ed596", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2024-08-14T19:02:46Z", GoVersion:"go1.22.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}

9. –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤‚Äã

–í —ç—Ç–æ–º —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–µ –æ–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ Kubernetes, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–∏–≤–∞—é—Ç –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω—É—é —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—É –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞.

  • containerd
  • kubelet
  • crictl
  • kubeadm
  • Kubernetes Audit

–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ containerd

‚óè –û–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

–≠—Ç–∞–ø—ã –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

  • –ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞
  • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ Systemd Unit –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞
  • –°—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç Systemd Unit
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤:

  • Containerd Install.
  • Runc Install.

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

  • Bash
  • Cloud-init

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π

mkdir -p /etc/containerd/
mkdir -p /etc/containerd/conf.d
mkdir -p /etc/containerd/certs.d

–ë–∞–∑–æ–≤—ã–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–∞–π–ª

cat <<"EOF" > /etc/containerd/config.toml
version = 2
imports = ["/etc/containerd/conf.d/*.toml"]
EOF

–®–∞–±–ª–æ–Ω –∫–∞—Å—Ç–æ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ñ–∞–π–ª–∞

cat <<"EOF" > /etc/containerd/conf.d/in-cloud.toml
version = 2
[plugins]
  [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri"]
    sandbox_image = "registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9"
  [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri".containerd.runtimes.runc]
    runtime_type = "io.containerd.runc.v2"
  [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri".containerd.runtimes.runc.options]
    SystemdCgroup = true
  [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri".registry]
    config_path = "/etc/containerd/certs.d/"
EOF

–ë–∞–∑–æ–≤—ã–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–∞–π–ª

- path: /etc/containerd/config.toml
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    version = 2
    imports = ["/etc/containerd/conf.d/*.toml"]

–®–∞–±–ª–æ–Ω –∫–∞—Å—Ç–æ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ñ–∞–π–ª–∞

- path: /etc/containerd/conf.d/in-cloud.toml
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    version = 2
    [plugins]
      [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri"]
        sandbox_image = "registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9"
      [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri".containerd.runtimes.runc]
        runtime_type = "io.containerd.runc.v2"
      [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri".containerd.runtimes.runc.options]
        SystemdCgroup = true
      [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri".registry]
        config_path = "/etc/containerd/certs.d/"

–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ Systemd Unit –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

  • Bash
  • Cloud-init
cat <<EOF > /usr/lib/systemd/system/containerd.service
[Unit]
Description=containerd container runtime
Documentation=https://containerd.io
After=network.target local-fs.target containerd-install.service runc-install.service
Wants=containerd-install.service runc-install.service

[Service]
ExecStartPre=-/sbin/modprobe overlay
ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/containerd

Type=notify
Delegate=yes
KillMode=process
Restart=always
RestartSec=5
LimitNPROC=infinity
LimitCORE=infinity
LimitNOFILE=infinity
TasksMax=infinity
OOMScoreAdjust=-999

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF
systemctl enable containerd
systemctl start containerd
# write_files:
- path: /usr/lib/systemd/system/containerd.service
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    [Unit]
    Description=containerd container runtime
    Documentation=https://containerd.io
    After=network.target local-fs.target containerd-install.service runc-install.service
    Wants=containerd-install.service runc-install.service

    [Service]
    ExecStartPre=-/sbin/modprobe overlay
    ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/containerd

    Type=notify
    Delegate=yes
    KillMode=process
    Restart=always
    RestartSec=5
    LimitNPROC=infinity
    LimitCORE=infinity
    LimitNOFILE=infinity
    TasksMax=infinity
    OOMScoreAdjust=-999

    [Install]
    WantedBy=multi-user.target
#runcmd:
- systemctl enable containerd
- systemctl start containerd

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏
tree /etc/containerd/
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
/etc/containerd/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ certs.d
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ conf.d
‚îÇ¬†¬† ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ cloud.toml
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ config.toml
systemctl status containerd
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã

    Main PID: 839 (containerd)
      Tasks: 7 (limit: 2274)
