–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ kubelet

‚óè –û–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

–≠—Ç–∞–ø—ã –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

  • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ Systemd Unit –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞
  • –î–æ–±–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å –≤ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫—É Systemd Unit
  • –ö–∞—Å—Ç–æ–º–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤:

  • Containerd Install.
  • Runc Install.

–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ Systemd Unit –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

  • Bash
  • Cloud-init
mkdir -p /usr/lib/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d
mkdir -p /var/lib/kubelet/

Systemd Unit

cat <<EOF > /usr/lib/systemd/system/kubelet.service
[Unit]
Description=kubelet: The Kubernetes Node Agent
Documentation=https://kubernetes.io/docs/
Wants=network-online.target containerd.service
After=network-online.target containerd.service

[Service]
ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/kubelet
Restart=always
StartLimitInterval=0
RestartSec=10

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

Systemd Unit Config

cat <<EOF > /usr/lib/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf
# Note: This dropin only works with kubeadm and kubelet v1.11+
[Service]
Environment="KUBELET_KUBECONFIG_ARGS=--bootstrap-kubeconfig=/etc/kubernetes/bootstrap-kubelet.conf --kubeconfig=/etc/kubernetes/kubelet.conf"
Environment="KUBELET_CONFIG_ARGS=--config=/var/lib/kubelet/config.yaml"
# This is a file that "kubeadm init" and "kubeadm join" generates at runtime, populating the KUBELET_KUBEADM_ARGS variable dynamically
EnvironmentFile=-/var/lib/kubelet/kubeadm-flags.env
# This is a file that the user can use for overrides of the kubelet args as a last resort. Preferably, the user should use
# the .NodeRegistration.KubeletExtraArgs object in the configuration files instead. KUBELET_EXTRA_ARGS should be sourced from this file.
EnvironmentFile=-/etc/default/kubelet/extra-args.env
ExecStart=
ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/kubelet \$KUBELET_KUBECONFIG_ARGS \$KUBELET_CONFIG_ARGS \$KUBELET_KUBEADM_ARGS \$KUBELET_EXTRA_ARGS
EOF
  • Default
  • Cloud Controller Manager

Systemd Unit ENV

cat <<EOF > /etc/default/kubelet/extra-args.env
KUBELET_EXTRA_ARGS=""
EOF

Systemd Unit ENV

cat <<EOF > /etc/default/kubelet/extra-args.env
KUBELET_EXTRA_ARGS="--cloud-provider=external"
EOF

–î–æ–±–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å –≤ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫—É Systemd Unit

systemctl enable kubelet

Systemd Unit ENV

# write_files:
- path: /usr/lib/systemd/system/kubelet.service
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    [Unit]
    Description=kubelet: The Kubernetes Node Agent
    Documentation=https://kubernetes.io/docs/
    Wants=network-online.target containerd.service
    After=network-online.target containerd.service

    [Service]
    ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/kubelet
    Restart=always
    StartLimitInterval=0
    RestartSec=10

    [Install]
    WantedBy=multi-user.target

–ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏

# write_files:
- path: /usr/lib/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    # Note: This dropin only works with kubeadm and kubelet v1.11+
    [Service]
    Environment="KUBELET_KUBECONFIG_ARGS=--bootstrap-kubeconfig=/etc/kubernetes/bootstrap-kubelet.conf --kubeconfig=/etc/kubernetes/kubelet.conf"
    Environment="KUBELET_CONFIG_ARGS=--config=/var/lib/kubelet/config.yaml"
    # This is a file that "kubeadm init" and "kubeadm join" generates at runtime, populating the KUBELET_KUBEADM_ARGS variable dynamically
    EnvironmentFile=-/var/lib/kubelet/kubeadm-flags.env
    # This is a file that the user can use for overrides of the kubelet args as a last resort. Preferably, the user should use
    # the .NodeRegistration.KubeletExtraArgs object in the configuration files instead. KUBELET_EXTRA_ARGS should be sourced from this file.
    EnvironmentFile=-/etc/default/kubelet/extra-args.env
    ExecStart=
    ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/kubelet $KUBELET_KUBECONFIG_ARGS $KUBELET_CONFIG_ARGS $KUBELET_KUBEADM_ARGS $KUBELET_EXTRA_ARGS

Systemd Unit Download

# write_files:
- path: /etc/default/kubelet/extra-args.env
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    KUBELET_EXTRA_ARGS="--cloud-provider=external"

Systemd Unit Custom ENV

–í–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –±–ª–æ–∫ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–∏–º —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –ø—Ä–∏ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–µ Kubernetes –≤—Ä—É—á–Ω—É—é (–º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–æ–º ¬´Kubernetes the Hard Way¬ª). –ü—Ä–∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏ —É—Ç–∏–ª–∏—Ç—ã kubeadm –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–∞–π–ª –±—É–¥–µ—Ç —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–∏, —É–∫–∞–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–π –≤ —Ñ–∞–π–ª–µ kubeadm-config.

# write_files:
- path: /var/lib/kubelet/kubeadm-flags.env
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    KUBELET_KUBEADM_ARGS="--container-runtime-endpoint=unix:///var/run/containerd/containerd.sock --pod-infra-container-image=registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9 --config=/var/lib/kubelet/config-custom.yaml"

–î–æ–±–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å –≤ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫—É Systemd Unit

# runcmd:
- systemctl enable kubelet

–ö–∞—Å—Ç–æ–º–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

Kubelet config
  • Bash
  • Cloud-init

–ö–∞—Å—Ç–æ–º–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–∞–π–ª kubelet

cat <<EOF > /var/lib/kubelet/config-custom.yaml
---
apiVersion: kubelet.config.k8s.io/v1beta1
authentication:
  anonymous:
      enabled: false
  webhook:
      cacheTTL: 0s
      enabled: true
  x509:
    clientCAFile: "/etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.crt"
authorization:
  mode: Webhook
  webhook:
    cacheAuthorizedTTL: 0s
    cacheUnauthorizedTTL: 0s
cgroupDriver: systemd
containerLogMaxSize: "50Mi"
containerRuntimeEndpoint: "/var/run/containerd/containerd.sock"
cpuManagerReconcilePeriod: 0s
evictionPressureTransitionPeriod: 5s
fileCheckFrequency: 0s
healthzBindAddress: 127.0.0.1
healthzPort: 10248
httpCheckFrequency: 0s
imageGCHighThresholdPercent: 55
imageGCLowThresholdPercent: 50
imageMaximumGCAge: 0s
imageMinimumGCAge: 0s
kind: KubeletConfiguration
logging:
  flushFrequency: 0
  options:
    json:
      infoBufferSize: "0"
    text:
      infoBufferSize: "0"
  verbosity: 0
kubeAPIQPS: 50
kubeAPIBurst: 100
maxPods: 250
memorySwap: {}
nodeStatusReportFrequency: 1s
nodeStatusUpdateFrequency: 1s
podPidsLimit: 4096
registerNode: true
resolvConf: /run/systemd/resolve/resolv.conf
rotateCertificates: true
runtimeRequestTimeout: 0s
serializeImagePulls: false
serverTLSBootstrap: true
shutdownGracePeriod: 15s
shutdownGracePeriodCriticalPods: 5s
staticPodPath: /etc/kubernetes/manifests
streamingConnectionIdleTimeout: 0s
syncFrequency: 0s
tlsMinVersion: "VersionTLS12"
volumeStatsAggPeriod: 0s
featureGates:
  RotateKubeletServerCertificate: true
  APIPriorityAndFairness:         true
tlsCipherSuites:
  - "TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256"
  - "TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256"
  - "TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384"
  - "TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384"
  - "TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256"
  - "TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256"
EOF

–ö–∞—Å—Ç–æ–º–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–∞–π–ª kubelet

- path: /var/lib/kubelet/config-custom.yaml
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    ---
    apiVersion: kubelet.config.k8s.io/v1beta1
    authentication:
      anonymous:
          enabled: false
      webhook:
          cacheTTL: 0s
          enabled: true
      x509:
        clientCAFile: "/etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.crt"
    authorization:
      mode: Webhook
      webhook:
        cacheAuthorizedTTL: 0s
        cacheUnauthorizedTTL: 0s
    cgroupDriver: systemd
    containerLogMaxSize: "50Mi"
    containerRuntimeEndpoint: "/var/run/containerd/containerd.sock"
    cpuManagerReconcilePeriod: 0s
    evictionPressureTransitionPeriod: 5s
    fileCheckFrequency: 0s
    healthzBindAddress: 127.0.0.1
    healthzPort: 10248
    httpCheckFrequency: 0s
    imageGCHighThresholdPercent: 55
    imageGCLowThresholdPercent: 50
    imageMaximumGCAge: 0s
    imageMinimumGCAge: 0s
    kind: KubeletConfiguration
    logging:
      flushFrequency: 0
      options:
        json:
          infoBufferSize: "0"
        text:
          infoBufferSize: "0"
      verbosity: 0
    kubeAPIQPS: 50
    kubeAPIBurst: 100
    maxPods: 250
    memorySwap: {}
    nodeStatusReportFrequency: 1s
    nodeStatusUpdateFrequency: 1s
    podPidsLimit: 4096
    registerNode: true
    resolvConf: /run/systemd/resolve/resolv.conf
    rotateCertificates: true
    runtimeRequestTimeout: 0s
    serializeImagePulls: false
    serverTLSBootstrap: true
    shutdownGracePeriod: 15s
    shutdownGracePeriodCriticalPods: 5s
    staticPodPath: /etc/kubernetes/manifests
    streamingConnectionIdleTimeout: 0s
    syncFrequency: 0s
    tlsMinVersion: "VersionTLS12"
    volumeStatsAggPeriod: 0s
    featureGates:
      RotateKubeletServerCertificate: true
      APIPriorityAndFairness:         true
    tlsCipherSuites:
      - "TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256"
      - "TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256"
      - "TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384"
      - "TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384"
      - "TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256"
      - "TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256"

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏
warning

–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ, —á—Ç–æ –ø—Ä–∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞ —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é Kubeadm –±–µ–∑ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥ kubeadm init –∏–ª–∏ kubeadm join, —Ñ–∞–π–ª –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ Kubelet (/var/lib/kubelet/config.yaml) –Ω–µ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω.

ls -la /var/lib/kubelet/config-custom.yaml
ls -la /usr/lib/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 1721 Feb 19 18:57 /var/lib/kubelet/config.yaml
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 903 Feb 19 22:10 /usr/lib/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf
warning

–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ, —á—Ç–æ –ø—Ä–∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞ —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é Kubeadm –±–µ–∑ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥ kubeadm init –∏–ª–∏ kubeadm join, Systemd Unit –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω –≤ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫, –Ω–æ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –≤—ã–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω.

systemctl status kubelet
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
‚óã kubelet.service - kubelet: The Kubernetes Node Agent
    Loaded: loaded (/usr/lib/systemd/system/kubelet.service; enabled; preset: enabled)
    Drop-In: /usr/lib/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d
            ‚îî‚îÄ10-kubeadm.conf
    Active: inactive (dead)
    Docs: https://kubernetes.io/docs/

–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ crictl

‚óè –ù–µ –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

–≠—Ç–∞–ø—ã –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

  • –ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞
  • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ Systemd Unit –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞
  • –°—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç Systemd Unit
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤:

  • Containerd Install.

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

  • Bash
  • Cloud-init

–®–∞–±–ª–æ–Ω –∫–∞—Å—Ç–æ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ —Ñ–∞–π–ª–∞

cat <<"EOF" > /etc/crictl.yaml
runtime-endpoint: unix:///var/run/containerd/containerd.sock
EOF

–®–∞–±–ª–æ–Ω –∫–∞—Å—Ç–æ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ —Ñ–∞–π–ª–∞

- path: /etc/crictl.yaml
  owner: root:root
  permissions: '0644'
  content: |
    runtime-endpoint: unix:///var/run/containerd/containerd.sock

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏
ls -la /etc/crictl.yaml
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 61 Feb 18 15:18 /etc/crictl.yaml
crictl info |
  jq '.status.conditions[] |
  select(.type=="RuntimeReady") |
  .status'
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
true

–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ kubeadm

‚óè –ù–µ –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

–≠—Ç–∞–ø—ã –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

  • –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π.
  • –ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤:

  • Kubelet Install.
  • Containerd Install.
  • Runc Install.

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π

mkdir -p /var/run/kubeadm/

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

  • init
  • join
–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è Kubeadm
  • master-1
export HOST_NAME=master-1
–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è Kubeadm –¥–ª—è –∏–Ω–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞
  • Bash
  • Cloud-init

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è —à–∞–±–ª–æ–Ω–∞ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ñ–∞–π–ª–∞

export CLUSTER_NAME='my-first-cluster'
export BASE_DOMAIN='example.com'
export FULL_HOST_NAME=${HOST_NAME}.${CLUSTER_NAME}.${BASE_DOMAIN}
export INTERNAL_API=api.${CLUSTER_NAME}.${BASE_DOMAIN}
export MACHINE_LOCAL_ADDRESS=$(ip -4 addr show scope global | awk '/inet/ {print $2; exit}' | cut -d/ -f1)
export ETCD_INITIAL_CLUSTER="${FULL_HOST_NAME}=https://${MACHINE_LOCAL_ADDRESS}:2380"
export CERTIFICATE_UPLOAD_KEY=0c00c2fd5c67c37656c00d78a9d7e1f2eb794ef8e4fc3e2a4b532eb14323cd59

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–∞–π–ª kubeadm –¥–ª—è –∏–Ω–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞

warning

–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ, —á—Ç–æ –≤ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–º –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–º —Ñ–∞–π–ª–µ —ç—Ç–∞–ø —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏ addons –∏–≥–Ω–æ—Ä–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç—Å—è.

cat <<EOF > /var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
---
apiVersion: kubeadm.k8s.io/v1beta3
kind: InitConfiguration
skipPhases:
  - addon
bootstrapTokens:
  - token: "fjt9ex.lwzqgdlvoxtqk4yw"
    description: "kubeadm bootstrap token"
    ttl: "24h"
certificateKey: ${CERTIFICATE_UPLOAD_KEY}
nodeRegistration:
  imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  taints: null
  kubeletExtraArgs:
    # -> –í–∫–ª—é—á–∏—Ç—å, –µ—Å–ª–∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç–µ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏–µ–º —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ Cloud Controller Manager
    # cloud-provider: external
    config: "/var/lib/kubelet/config-custom.yaml"
    cluster-domain: cluster.local
    cluster-dns: "29.64.0.10"
  # name: '${FULL_HOST_NAME}'
  ignorePreflightErrors:
    # > –ü—Ä–∏ –ø–æ—ç—Ç–∞–ø–Ω–æ–π —Å–±–æ—Ä–∫–µ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞, –∞ –Ω–µ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –µ–¥–∏–Ω–æ–π ␀–∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã,
    # > –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ —É–∫–∞–∑–∞—Ç—å –∏—Å–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤ –ø–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä–µ ignorePreflightErrors,
    # > —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ kubeadm init phase preflight –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–ª–∞—Å—å –±–µ–∑ –ø—Ä–µ–ø—è—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π.
    # > –î–ª—è —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ –≤ nodeRegistration –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è—é—Ç—Å—è —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–µ –∏—Å–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è:
    - FileAvailable--etc-kubernetes-manifests-kube-apiserver.yaml
    - FileAvailable--etc-kubernetes-manifests-kube-controller-manager.yaml
    - FileAvailable--etc-kubernetes-manifests-kube-scheduler.yaml
    - FileAvailable--etc-kubernetes-manifests-etcd.yaml
---
apiVersion: kubeadm.k8s.io/v1beta3
kind: ClusterConfiguration
clusterName: "${CLUSTER_NAME}"
certificatesDir: /etc/kubernetes/pki
controlPlaneEndpoint: ${INTERNAL_API}:6443
imageRepository: "registry.k8s.io"
networking:
  serviceSubnet: 29.64.0.0/16
  dnsDomain: cluster.local
kubernetesVersion: v1.30.4
dns: {}
etcd:
  local:
    imageRepository: "registry.k8s.io"
    dataDir: "/var/lib/etcd"
    extraArgs:
      auto-compaction-retention: "8"
      cert-file: "/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/server.crt"
      client-cert-auth: "true"
      data-dir: "/var/lib/etcd"
      election-timeout: "1500"
      heartbeat-interval: "250"
      key-file: "/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/server.key"
      listen-client-urls: "https://0.0.0.0:2379"
      listen-metrics-urls: "http://0.0.0.0:2381"
      listen-peer-urls: "https://0.0.0.0:2380"
      logger: "zap"
      max-snapshots: "10"
      max-wals: "10"
      metrics: "extensive"
      peer-cert-file: "/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/peer.crt"
      peer-client-cert-auth: "true"
      peer-key-file: "/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/peer.key"
      peer-trusted-ca-file: "/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.crt"
      snapshot-count: "10000"
      quota-backend-bytes: "10737418240" # TODO
      experimental-initial-corrupt-check: "true"
      experimental-watch-progress-notify-interval: "5s"
      trusted-ca-file: "/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.crt"
    peerCertSANs:
      - 127.0.0.1
    serverCertSANs:
      - 127.0.0.1
apiServer:
  extraArgs:
    aggregator-reject-forwarding-redirect: "true"
    allow-privileged: "true"
    anonymous-auth: "true"
    api-audiences: "konnectivity-server"
    apiserver-count: "1"
    audit-log-batch-buffer-size: "10000"
    audit-log-batch-max-size: "1"
    audit-log-batch-max-wait: "0s"
    audit-log-batch-throttle-burst: "0"
    audit-log-batch-throttle-enable: "false"
    audit-log-batch-throttle-qps: "0"
    audit-log-compress: "false"
    audit-log-format: "json"
    audit-log-maxage: "30"
    audit-log-maxbackup: "10"
    audit-log-maxsize: "1000"
    audit-log-mode: "batch"
    audit-log-truncate-enabled: "false"
    audit-log-truncate-max-batch-size: "10485760"
    audit-log-truncate-max-event-size: "102400"
    audit-log-version: "audit.k8s.io/v1"
    audit-webhook-batch-buffer-size: "10000"
    audit-webhook-batch-initial-backoff: "10s"
    audit-webhook-batch-max-size: "400"
    audit-webhook-batch-max-wait: "30s"
    audit-webhook-batch-throttle-burst: "15"
    audit-webhook-batch-throttle-enable: "true"
    audit-webhook-batch-throttle-qps: "10"
    audit-webhook-initial-backoff: "10s"
    audit-webhook-mode: "batch"
    audit-webhook-truncate-enabled: "false"
    audit-webhook-truncate-max-batch-size: "10485760"
    audit-webhook-truncate-max-event-size: "102400"
    audit-webhook-version: "audit.k8s.io/v1"

    ---
    apiVersion: kubeadm.k8s.io/v1beta3
    kind: InitConfiguration
    skipPhases:
      - addon
    bootstrapTokens:

        description: "kubeadm bootstrap token"

      taints: null

        cluster-dns: "29.64.0.10"

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è Kubeadm
  • master-2
  • master-3
export HOST_NAME=master-2
export HOST_NAME=master-3
–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è Kubeadm –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –º–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä –Ω–æ–¥—ã –∫ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä—É

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è —à–∞–±–ª–æ–Ω–∞ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ñ–∞–π–ª–∞

export MACHINE_LOCAL_ADDRESS="$(ip -4 addr show scope global | awk '/inet/ {print $2; exit}' | cut -d/ -f1)"
export CLUSTER_API_ENDPOINT=api.my-first-cluster.example.com
export CERTIFICATE_UPLOAD_KEY=0c00c2fd5c67c37656c00d78a9d7e1f2eb794ef8e4fc3e2a4b532eb14323cd59

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–∞–π–ª kubeadm –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –º–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞ –∫ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä—É

cat <<EOF > /var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
---
apiVersion: kubeadm.k8s.io/v1beta3
controlPlane:
  localAPIEndpoint:
    advertiseAddress: ${MACHINE_LOCAL_ADDRESS}
    bindPort: 6443
  certificateKey: ${CERTIFICATE_UPLOAD_KEY}
discovery:
  bootstrapToken:
    apiServerEndpoint: ${CLUSTER_API_ENDPOINT}:6443
    unsafeSkipCAVerification: true
    token: "fjt9ex.lwzqgdlvoxtqk4yw"
kind: JoinConfiguration
EOF

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏
ls -al /var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 6463 Feb 18 15:20 /var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml

–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ Kubernetes Audit

‚óè –ù–µ –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

–≠—Ç–∞–ø—ã –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

  • –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–π –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏
  • –ü–æ–¥–≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–∫–∞ –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∏ –∞—É–¥–∏—Ç–∞

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–π –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏

mkdir -p /var/log/kubernetes/audit

–ü–æ–¥–≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–∫–∞ –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∏ –∞—É–¥–∏—Ç–∞

cat <<EOF > /var/log/kubernetes/audit/audit-policy.yaml
---
apiVersion: audit.k8s.io/v1
kind: Policy

# –û–±—â–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª–∞
# –ò—Å–∫–ª—é—á–∞–µ–º —Ä–∞–Ω–Ω—é—é —Å—Ç–∞–¥–∏—é –∞—É–¥–∏—Ç–∞ "RequestReceived", —á—Ç–æ–±—ã —Å–Ω–∏–∑–∏—Ç—å –æ–±—ä–µ–º –ª–æ–≥–æ–≤ –∏ –¥—É–±–ª–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ
# –≠—Ç–∞ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –≥–ª–æ–±–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ, –Ω–æ –≤ –Ω–µ–∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª–∞—Ö –ø–µ—Ä–µ–æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –ª–æ–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ
# omitStages –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –±—ã—Ç—å —É–∫–∞–∑–∞–Ω–æ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ –æ—Ç–¥–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª
rules:

  # –û—Ç–∫–ª—é—á–∞–µ–º –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ "watch"-–∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–æ–≤ –æ—Ç kube-proxy –∫ endpoint'–∞–º –∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞–º
  - level: None
    users: ["system:kube-proxy"]
    verbs: ["watch"]
    resources:
      - group: ""  # Core API group
        resources: ["endpoints", "services", "services/status"]

  # –û—Ç–∫–ª—é—á–∞–µ–º –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è configmap –≤ kube-system –æ—Ç "system:unsecured"
  - level: None
    users: ["system:unsecured"]
    namespaces: ["kube-system"]
    verbs: ["get"]
    resources:
      - group: ""
        resources: ["configmaps"]

  # –û—Ç–∫–ª—é—á–∞–µ–º –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è —É–∑–ª–æ–≤ legacy-–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–º "kubelet"
  - level: None
    users: ["kubelet"]
    verbs: ["get"]
    resources:
      - group: ""
        resources: ["nodes", "nodes/status"]

  # –û—Ç–∫–ª—é—á–∞–µ–º –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è —É–∑–ª–æ–≤ –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø–æ–π "system:nodes"
  - level: None
    userGroups: ["system:nodes"]
    verbs: ["get"]
    resources:
      - group: ""
        resources: ["nodes", "nodes/status"]

  # –û—Ç–∫–ª—é—á–∞–µ–º –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ get/update endpoint'–æ–≤ –≤ kube-system –æ—Ç –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª–ª–µ—Ä–æ–≤
  - level: None
    users:
      - system:kube-controller-manager
      - system:kube-scheduler
      - system:serviceaccount:kube-system:endpoint-controller
    verbs: ["get", "update"]
    namespaces: ["kube-system"]
    resources:
      - group: ""
        resources: ["endpoints"]

  # –û—Ç–∫–ª—é—á–∞–µ–º –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ–ø–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–π —Å namespace'–∞–º–∏ –æ—Ç —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è apiserver
  - level: None
    users: ["system:apiserver"]
    verbs: ["get"]
    resources:
      - group: ""
        resources: ["namespaces", "namespaces/status", "namespaces/finalize"]

  # –û—Ç–∫–ª—é—á–∞–µ–º –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ–ø–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–π —Å configmap –∏ endpoint –≤ kube-system –æ—Ç cluster-autoscaler
  - level: None
    users: ["cluster-autoscaler"]
    verbs: ["get", "update"]
    namespaces: ["kube-system"]
    resources:
      - group: ""
        resources: ["configmaps", "endpoints"]

  # –û—Ç–∫–ª—é—á–∞–µ–º –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–æ–≤ –∫ –º–µ—Ç—Ä–∏–∫–∞–º –æ—Ç kube-controller-manager
  - level: None
    users: ["system:kube-controller-manager"]
    verbs: ["get", "list"]
    resources:
      - group: "metrics.k8s.io"

  # –û—Ç–∫–ª—é—á–∞–µ–º –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω—ã—Ö non-resource URL (–∑–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≤—å–µ, –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏—è, swagger –∏ —Ç.–ø.)
  - level: None
    nonResourceURLs:
      - /healthz*
      - /version
      - /swagger*

  # –û—Ç–∫–ª—é—á–∞–µ–º –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–æ–±—ã—Ç–∏–π (events) ‚Äî –æ–Ω–∏ —á–∞—Å—Ç–æ —à—É–º–Ω—ã–µ –∏ –Ω–µ –∫—Ä–∏—Ç–∏—á–Ω—ã
  - level: None
    resources:
      - group: ""
        resources: ["events"]

  # –õ–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–π —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å–∞ —É–∑–ª–æ–≤ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–æ–≤ –æ—Ç kubelet –∏ node-problem-detector
  - level: Request
    users:
      - kubelet
      - system:node-problem-detector
      - system:serviceaccount:kube-system:node-problem-detector
    verbs:
      - update
      - patch
    resources:
      - group: ""
        resources:
          - nodes/status
          - pods/status
    omitStages:
      - "RequestReceived"

  # –¢–æ –∂–µ —Å–∞–º–æ–µ –¥–ª—è –≤—Å–µ—Ö —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤ –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø—ã system:nodes
  - level: Request
    userGroups: ["system:nodes"]
    verbs:
      - update
      - patch
    resources:
      - group: ""
        resources:
          - nodes/status
          - pods/status
    omitStages:
      - "RequestReceived"

  # –õ–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –º–∞—Å—Å–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è (deletecollection) –æ—Ç namespace-controller
  - level: Request
    users: ["system:serviceaccount:kube-system:namespace-controller"]
    verbs: ["deletecollection"]
    omitStages:
      - "RequestReceived"

  # –õ–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –º–µ—Ç–∞–¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–ª—è —á—É–≤—Å—Ç–≤–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤: —Å–µ–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–æ–≤, —Ç–æ–∫–µ–Ω–æ–≤, —Ç–æ–∫–µ–Ω-—Ä–µ—Ü–µ–Ω–∑–∏–π
  - level: Metadata
    resources:
      - group: ""
        resources: ["secrets", "configmaps", "serviceaccounts/token"]
      - group: authentication.k8s.io
        resources: ["tokenreviews"]
    omitStages:
      - "RequestReceived"

  # –õ–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤—Å–µ—Ö –±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω—ã—Ö –æ–ø–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–π —á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è (get/list/watch) –ø–æ –≤—Å–µ–º –∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã–º –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø–∞–º
  - level: Request
    verbs: ["get", "list", "watch"]
    resources:
      - group: ""  # Core
      - group: "admissionregistration.k8s.io"
      - group: "apiextensions.k8s.io"
      - group: "apiregistration.k8s.io"
      - group: "apps"
      - group: "authentication.k8s.io"
      - group: "authorization.k8s.io"
      - group: "autoscaling"
      - group: "batch"
      - group: "certificates.k8s.io"
      - group: "extensions"
      - group: "metrics.k8s.io"
      - group: "networking.k8s.io"
      - group: "policy"
      - group: "rbac.authorization.k8s.io"
      - group: "scheduling.k8s.io"
      - group: "settings.k8s.io"
      - group: "storage.k8s.io"
    omitStages:
      - "RequestReceived"

  # –õ–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤—Å–µ—Ö –æ–ø–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–π, –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—è —Ç–µ–ª–æ –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∞ –∏ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç–∞ (RequestResponse)
  - level: RequestResponse
    resources:
      - group: ""  # Core
      - group: "admissionregistration.k8s.io"
      - group: "apiextensions.k8s.io"
      - group: "apiregistration.k8s.io"
      - group: "apps"
      - group: "authentication.k8s.io"
      - group: "authorization.k8s.io"
      - group: "autoscaling"
      - group: "batch"
      - group: "certificates.k8s.io"
      - group: "extensions"
      - group: "metrics.k8s.io"
      - group: "networking.k8s.io"
      - group: "policy"
      - group: "rbac.authorization.k8s.io"
      - group: "scheduling.k8s.io"
      - group: "settings.k8s.io"
      - group: "storage.k8s.io"
    omitStages:
      - "RequestReceived"

  # –§–∏–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π catch-all: –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –º–µ—Ç–∞–¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –≤—Å–µ–≥–æ –æ—Å—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ
  - level: Metadata
    omitStages:
      - "RequestReceived"
EOF

10. –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤‚Äã

–≠—Ç–æ—Ç —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –æ–ø–∏—Å—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∏ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ Kubernetes –¥–æ –∏–Ω–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞ –∏–ª–∏ –ø—Ä–∏—Å–æ–µ–¥–∏–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö —É–∑–ª–æ–≤.

  • Init
  • Join

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤

‚óè –ù–µ –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

kubeadm init phase preflight --dry-run \
  --config=/var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã

–ï—Å–ª–∏ –≤—Å–µ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–æ –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ, –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç—Å—è –±–µ–∑ –æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫, –∏ –≤—ã —É–≤–∏–¥–∏—Ç–µ —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–π –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥:

[preflight] Running pre-flight checks
[preflight] Would pull the required images (like 'kubeadm config images pull')
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã

–ï—Å–ª–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å –±—ã–ª –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω –≤ –ø–æ–ª—É–∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–º —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º–µ, —Ç–æ –¥–æ–ø—É—Å—Ç–∏–º—ã–π –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥ –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –≤—ã–≥–ª—è–¥–µ—Ç—å —Ç–∞–∫:

[WARNING FileAvailable--etc-kubernetes-manifests-kube-apiserver.yaml]: /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml already exists
[WARNING FileAvailable--etc-kubernetes-manifests-kube-controller-manager.yaml]: /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml already exists
[WARNING FileAvailable--etc-kubernetes-manifests-kube-scheduler.yaml]: /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-scheduler.yaml already exists
[WARNING FileAvailable--etc-kubernetes-manifests-etcd.yaml]: /etc/kubernetes/manifests/etcd.yaml already exists
[preflight] Running pre-flight checks
[preflight] Reading configuration from the cluster...
[preflight] FYI: You can look at this config file with 'kubectl -n kube-system get cm kubeadm-config -o yaml'
[preflight] Running pre-flight checks before initializing the new control plane instance
[preflight] Would pull the required images (like 'kubeadm config images pull')

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤

‚óè –ù–µ –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

kubeadm join phase preflight --dry-run \
  --config=/var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—á–∞–Ω–∏–µ

–ï—Å–ª–∏ –≤—Å–µ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–æ –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ, –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç—Å—è –±–µ–∑ –æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫, –∏ –≤—ã —É–≤–∏–¥–∏—Ç–µ —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–π –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥:

[preflight] Running pre-flight checks
[preflight] Reading configuration from the cluster...
[preflight] FYI: You can look at this config file with 'kubectl -n kube-system get cm kubeadm-config -o yaml'
[preflight] Running pre-flight checks before initializing the new control plane instance
[preflight] Would pull the required images (like 'kubeadm config images pull')
–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—á–∞–Ω–∏–µ

–ï—Å–ª–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å –±—ã–ª –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω –≤ –ø–æ–ª—É–∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–º —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º–µ, —Ç–æ –¥–æ–ø—É—Å—Ç–∏–º—ã–π –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥ –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –≤—ã–≥–ª—è–¥–µ—Ç—å —Ç–∞–∫:

[WARNING FileAvailable--etc-kubernetes-manifests-kube-apiserver.yaml]: /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml already exists
[WARNING FileAvailable--etc-kubernetes-manifests-kube-controller-manager.yaml]: /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml already exists
[WARNING FileAvailable--etc-kubernetes-manifests-kube-scheduler.yaml]: /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-scheduler.yaml already exists
[WARNING FileAvailable--etc-kubernetes-manifests-etcd.yaml]: /etc/kubernetes/manifests/etcd.yaml already exists
[preflight] Running pre-flight checks
[preflight] Reading configuration from the cluster...
[preflight] FYI: You can look at this config file with 'kubectl -n kube-system get cm kubeadm-config -o yaml'
[preflight] Running pre-flight checks before initializing the new control plane instance
[preflight] Would pull the required images (like 'kubeadm config images pull')

11. –†–∞–±–æ␀—Ç–∞ —Å —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞–º–∏‚Äã

–í –¥–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–º —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–µ —Ä–∞—Å—Å–º–∞—Ç—Ä–∏–≤–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª–∞ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –≤ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–µ Kubernetes: –∫–∞–∫–∏–µ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç—ã –∑–∞–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—Ç —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç—ã, –∫–µ–º –æ–Ω–∏ –ø–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å—ã–≤–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –∏ –∫–∞–∫ –æ—Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –ø–æ–¥–ª–∏–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏.

  • masters
  • workers

12. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ—Ä–Ω–µ–≤—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤‚Äã

–¶–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–∏ (CA) ‚Äî —ç—Ç–æ –¥–æ–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –∏—Å—Ç–æ—á–Ω–∏–∫, –≤—ã–ø—É—Å–∫–∞—é—â–∏–π –∫–æ—Ä–Ω–µ–≤—ã–µ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç—ã, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—é—Ç—Å—è –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∏ –≤—Å–µ—Ö –æ—Å—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞ Kubernetes.

–°–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç—ã CA –∏–≥—Ä–∞—é—Ç –∫–ª—é—á–µ–≤—É—é —Ä–æ–ª—å –≤ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –¥–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∏—è –º–µ–∂–¥—É –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏, –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–∏–≤–∞—è –∞—É—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏—é, —à–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ —Ü–µ–ª–æ—Å—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –∫–æ–º–º—É–Ω–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–π.

–í —ç—Ç–æ–º —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–µ –æ–ø–∏—Å—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ—Ä–Ω–µ–≤—ã—Ö (root) —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—é—Ç—Å—è –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∏ –æ—Å—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –≤ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–µ Kubernetes.

  • Init
  • Join

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ—Ä–Ω–µ–≤—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤

‚óè –û–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

  • Kubernetes –¶–ê
  • FrontProxy –¶–ê
  • ETCD –¶–ê
Kubernetes CA
warning

–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ: –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –±–ª–æ–∫ –æ–ø–∏—Å—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ—Ä–Ω–µ–≤—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤ Kubernetes CA.

  • HardWay
  • Kubeadm

–†–∞–±–æ—á–∞—è –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è

mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/openssl
mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/pki

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/kubernetes/openssl/ca.conf
[req]
distinguished_name = req_distinguished_name
x509_extensions    = v3_ca
prompt             = no

[req_distinguished_name]
CN = kubernetes

[v3_ca]
keyUsage = critical, keyCertSign, keyEncipherment, digitalSignature
basicConstraints = critical,CA:TRUE
EOF

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–ª—é—á–∞

openssl genrsa \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.key 2048

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—É–±–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–ª—é—á–∞

openssl req \
  -x509 \
  -new \
  -nodes \
  -key /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.key \
  -sha256 \
  -days 3650 \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.crt \
  -config /etc/kubernetes/openssl/ca.conf
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–æ–≤:

  • SSL Certificate Check.
/etc/kubernetes/openssl/cert-report.sh /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.crt
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
ca                      Oct 20, 2034 22:04 UTC   9y              no

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤

kubeadm init phase certs ca \
  --config=/var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—á–∞–Ω–∏–µ

–ü–æ—Å–ª–µ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–π –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥.

#### Create Kubernetes CA
[certs] Generating "ca" certificate and key
FrontProxy CA
warning

–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ: –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –±–ª–æ–∫ –æ–ø–∏—Å—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ—Ä–Ω–µ–≤—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤ Front Proxy CA.

  • HardWay
  • Kubeadm

–†–∞–±–æ—á–∞—è –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è

mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/openssl
mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/pki

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/kubernetes/openssl/front-proxy-ca.conf
[req]
distinguished_name = req_distinguished_name
x509_extensions    = v3_ca
prompt             = no

[req_distinguished_name]
CN = front-proxy-ca

[v3_ca]
keyUsage = critical, keyCertSign, keyEncipherment, digitalSignature
basicConstraints = critical,CA:TRUE
EOF

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–ª—é—á–∞

openssl genrsa \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/front-proxy-ca.key 2048

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—É–±–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–ª—é—á–∞

openssl req \
  -x509 \
  -new \
  -nodes \
  -key /etc/kubernetes/pki/front-proxy-ca.key \
  -sha256 \
  -days 3650 \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/front-proxy-ca.crt \
  -config /etc/kubernetes/openssl/front-proxy-ca.conf
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–æ–≤:

  • SSL Certificate Check.
/etc/kubernetes/openssl/cert-report.sh /etc/kubernetes/pki/front-proxy-ca.crt
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
front-proxy-ca          Oct 20, 2034 22:04 UTC   9y              no

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤

kubeadm init phase certs front-proxy-ca \
  --config=/var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—á–∞–Ω–∏–µ

–ü–æ—Å–ª–µ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–π –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥.

#### Create Front Proxy CA
[certs] Generating "front-proxy-ca" certificate and key
ETCD CA
warning

–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ: –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –±–ª–æ–∫ –æ–ø–∏—Å—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ—Ä–Ω–µ–≤—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤ ETCD CA.

  • HardWay
  • Kubeadm

–†–∞–±–æ—á–∞—è –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è

mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/openssl
mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/kubernetes/openssl/etcd-ca.conf
[req]
distinguished_name = req_distinguished_name
x509_extensions    = v3_ca
prompt             = no

[req_distinguished_name]
CN = "etcd-ca"

[v3_ca]
keyUsage = critical, keyCertSign, keyEncipherment, digitalSignature
basicConstraints = critical,CA:TRUE
EOF

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–ª—é—á–∞

openssl genrsa \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.key 2048

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—É–±–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–ª—é—á–∞

openssl req \
  -x509 \
  -new \
  -nodes \
  -key /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.key \
  -sha256 \
  -days 3650 \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.crt \
  -config /etc/kubernetes/openssl/etcd-ca.conf
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–æ–≤:

  • SSL Certificate Check.
/etc/kubernetes/openssl/cert-report.sh /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.crt
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
etcd-ca                 Oct 20, 2034 22:04 UTC   9y              no

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤

kubeadm init phase certs etcd-ca \
  --config=/var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—á–∞–Ω–∏–µ

–ü–æ—Å–ª–µ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã –º—ã –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–π –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥.

#### Create ETCD CA
[certs] Generating "etcd/ca" certificate and key

–í—ã–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞ —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–∏—Ö CA

‚óè –û–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø␀—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

  • HardWay
  • Kubeadm
warning

–í —ç—Ç–æ–º —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∞ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –ø–æ –≤—ã–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–µ –∫–æ—Ä–Ω–µ–≤—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –∏–∑ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—é—â–µ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—É—Ä–∞ Kubernetes. –°–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç—ã –≤—ã–≥—Ä—É–∂–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –≤ –∑–∞—à–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–º –≤–∏–¥–µ –∏–∑ —Ä–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å–∞ Secret, —á—Ç–æ –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –∏—Ö –±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–¥–∞–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞ —É–∑–ª–µ –¥–ª—è —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∂–∏–∑–Ω–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º —Ü–∏–∫–ª–æ–º —É–∑–ª–æ–≤ –£–ö.

–†–∞–±–æ—á–∞—è –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è

mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/openssl
mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/pki
mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

–í–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ!

–ü–æ–¥ –∫–∞–∂–¥—É—é –Ω–æ–¥—É –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ä–µ–¥–µ —Ä–µ–∫–æ–º–µ–Ω–¥—É–µ—Ç—Å—è —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–≤–∞—Ç—å –æ—Ç–¥–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–π bootstrap-—Ç–æ–∫–µ–Ω. –û–¥–Ω–∞–∫–æ, –¥–ª—è —Ü–µ–ª–µ–π –¥–µ–º–æ–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ (–∏ –≤ —Ä–∞–º–∫–∞—Ö –¥–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–π –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏) –º—ã —É–ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∏–ª–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å –∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º –æ–¥–∏–Ω –æ–±—â–∏–π —Ç–æ–∫–µ–Ω –¥–ª—è –≤—Å–µ—Ö —É–∑–ª–æ–≤ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—é—â–µ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—É—Ä–∞.

export CERTIFICATE_UPLOAD_KEY=0c00c2fd5c67c37656c00d78a9d7e1f2eb794ef8e4fc3e2a4b532eb14323cd59
export KUBE_API_BOOTSTRAP_TOKEN=fjt9ex.lwzqgdlvoxtqk4yw
export KUBE_API_SERVER=https://api.my-first-cluster.example.com:6443
cat <<EOF > /etc/kubernetes/openssl/decrypt.py
#!/usr/bin/env python3
import sys, base64
from cryptography.hazmat.primitives.ciphers.aead import AESGCM

key = bytes.fromhex(sys.argv[1])
payload = base64.b64decode(sys.argv[2])

nonce, ct = payload[:12], payload[12:]
aesgcm = AESGCM(key)
plain = aesgcm.decrypt(nonce, ct, None)
sys.stdout.buffer.write(plain)
EOF
cat <<'EOF' > /etc/kubernetes/openssl/download-certs.sh
#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

CERT_PATH="/etc/kubernetes/pki"
KEY="${CERTIFICATE_UPLOAD_KEY:-}"
PY_SCRIPT="$(dirname "$0")/decrypt.py"
KUBE_API_SERVER="${KUBE_API_SERVER:-https://127.0.0.1:6443}"
TOKEN="${KUBE_API_BOOTSTRAP_TOKEN:?KUBE_API_BOOTSTRAP_TOKEN is required}"

declare -A files=(
  ["ca.crt"]="$CERT_PATH/ca.crt"
  ["ca.key"]="$CERT_PATH/ca.key"
  ["etcd-ca.crt"]="$CERT_PATH/etcd/ca.crt"
  ["etcd-ca.key"]="$CERT_PATH/etcd/ca.key"
  ["front-proxy-ca.crt"]="$CERT_PATH/front-proxy-ca.crt"
  ["front-proxy-ca.key"]="$CERT_PATH/front-proxy-ca.key"
  ["sa.key"]="$CERT_PATH/sa.key"
  ["sa.pub"]="$CERT_PATH/sa.pub"
)

mkdir -p "$CERT_PATH"
echo "[INFO] Using certificate key: $KEY"
echo "[WARN] TLS verification is DISABLED (insecure mode)"
echo "[INFO] Fetching Secret kubeadm-certs from API..."

RESPONSE=$(curl -sSL -k \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN" \
  "$KUBE_API_SERVER/api/v1/namespaces/kube-system/secrets/kubeadm-certs")

echo "$RESPONSE" | jq -r '.data | to_entries[] | @base64' | while read -r item; do
  name=$(echo "$item" | base64 -d | jq -r '.key')
  b64=$(echo "$item" | base64 -d | jq -r '.value' | tr -d '\n')

  out_path="${files[$name]:-}"
  if [[ -z "$out_path" ]]; then
    echo "[WARN] Unknown certificate: $name ‚Äî skipping"
    continue
  fi

  mkdir -p "$(dirname "$out_path")"
  echo "[INFO] Decrypting $name ‚Üí $out_path"
  python3 "$PY_SCRIPT" "$KEY" "$b64" > "$out_path"
done

echo "[INFO] Certificates unpacked."
EOF

–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤

chmod +x /etc/kubernetes/openssl/download-certs.sh

–ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–∞

/etc/kubernetes/openssl/download-certs.sh
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
[INFO] Using certificate key: 0c00c2fd5c67c37656c00d78a9d7e1f2eb794ef8e4fc3e2a4b532eb14323cd59
[WARN] TLS verification is DISABLED (insecure mode)
[INFO] Fetching Secret kubeadm-certs from API...
[INFO] Decrypting ca.crt ‚Üí /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.crt
[INFO] Decrypting ca.key ‚Üí /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.key
[INFO] Decrypting etcd-ca.crt ‚Üí /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.crt
[INFO] Decrypting etcd-ca.key ‚Üí /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.key
[INFO] Decrypting front-proxy-ca.crt ‚Üí /etc/kubernetes/pki/front-proxy-ca.crt
[INFO] Decrypting front-proxy-ca.key ‚Üí /etc/kubernetes/pki/front-proxy-ca.key
[INFO] Decrypting sa.key ‚Üí /etc/kubernetes/pki/sa.key
[INFO] Decrypting sa.pub ‚Üí /etc/kubernetes/pki/sa.pub
[INFO] Certificates unpacked.
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–æ–≤:

  • Kubeadm Configs.

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –º–∞–Ω–∏—Ñ–µ—Å—Ç–∞

kubeadm join phase control-plane-prepare download-certs \
  --config=/var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
[preflight] Reading configuration from the cluster...
[preflight] FYI: You can look at this config file with 'kubectl -n kube-system get cm kubeadm-config -o yaml'
[download-certs] Downloading the certificates in Secret "kubeadm-certs" in the "kube-system" Namespace
[download-certs] Saving the certificates to the folder: "/etc/kubernetes/pki"

13. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π‚Äã

–°–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç—ã ‚Äî —ç—Ç–æ —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤—ã–µ –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã, —É–¥–æ—Å—Ç–æ–≤–µ—Ä—è—é—â–∏–µ –ø–æ–¥–ª–∏–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞ Kubernetes. –û–Ω–∏ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–∏–≤–∞—é—Ç –±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω—É—é –∫–æ–º–º—É–Ω–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏—é, –∞—É—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏—é –∏ —à–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏ –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–∏ –º–µ–∂–¥—É —É–∑–ª–∞–º–∏, –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è–º–∏.

–í—Å–µ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç—ã —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç—ã—Ö –∫–ª—é—á–µ–π (PKI) –∏ —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∞—Ç –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—é –æ –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–ª—å—Ü–µ, —Å—Ä–æ–∫–µ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è –∏ —É–¥–æ—Å—Ç–æ–≤–µ—Ä—è—é—â–µ–º —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–µ (CA), –≤—ã–¥–∞–≤—à–µ–º —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç.

–í —ç—Ç–æ–º —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–µ —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∏—Ä—É—é—Ç—Å—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç—ã, –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—ã–µ –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ Kubernetes (API-—Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä, kubelet, controller-manager –∏ –¥—Ä.).

  • Init
  • Join

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π

‚óè –û–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

  • Kubelet Server
  • API -> Etcd
  • API -> Kubelet
  • API Server
  • Proxy -> API
  • Etcd Client
  • Etcd Server
  • Etcd Peer

Kubelet server

  • HardWay
  • Kubeadm

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

export CLUSTER_NAME=my-first-cluster
export BASE_DOMAIN=example.com
export CLUSTER_DOMAIN=cluster.local
export FULL_HOST_NAME=${HOST_NAME}.${CLUSTER_NAME}.${BASE_DOMAIN}
export MACHINE_LOCAL_ADDRESS=$(ip -4 addr show scope global | awk '/inet/ {print $2; exit}' | cut -d/ -f1)

–†–∞–±–æ—á–∞—è –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è

mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/pki
mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr
mkdir -p /var/lib/kubelet/pki

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/kubernetes/openssl/kubelet-server.conf
[ req ]
default_bits        = 2048
prompt              = no
default_md          = sha256
distinguished_name  = dn
req_extensions      = req_ext

[ req_ext ]
subjectAltName = @alt_names

[ alt_names ]
DNS.1 = localhost
DNS.2 = ${HOST_NAME}
DNS.3 = ${FULL_HOST_NAME}
IP.1  = 127.0.0.1
IP.2  = 0:0:0:0:0:0:0:1
IP.3  = ${MACHINE_LOCAL_ADDRESS}

[ dn ]
CN = "system:node:${FULL_HOST_NAME}
O  = "system:nodes"

[ v3_ext ]
authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid,issuer:always
basicConstraints=CA:FALSE
keyUsage=keyEncipherment,dataEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage=serverAuth
subjectAltName=@alt_names
EOF

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–ª—é—á–∞

openssl genrsa \
  -out /var/lib/kubelet/pki/kubelet-server-key.pem 2048

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è CSR

openssl req \
-new \
-key /var/lib/kubelet/pki/kubelet-server-key.pem \
-out /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/kubelet-server.csr \
-config /etc/kubernetes/openssl/kubelet-server.conf

–ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å—å CSR

openssl x509 \
  -req \
  -days 365 \
  -sha256 \
  -outform PEM \
  -CA /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.crt \
  -CAkey /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.key \
  -CAcreateserial \
  -in /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/kubelet-server.csr \
  -out /var/lib/kubelet/pki/kubelet-server.pem \
  -extensions v3_ext \
  -extfile /etc/kubernetes/openssl/kubelet-server.conf
cat /var/lib/kubelet/pki/kubelet-server.pem /var/lib/kubelet/pki/kubelet-server-key.pem >> /var/lib/kubelet/pki/kubelet-server-$(date '+%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S').pem
ln -s /var/lib/kubelet/pki/kubelet-server-$(date '+%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S').pem /var/lib/kubelet/pki/kubelet-server-current.pem
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–æ–≤:

  • SSL Certificate Check.
/etc/kubernetes/openssl/cert-report.sh /var/lib/kubelet/pki/kubelet-server.pem
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE                EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
kubelet-server-current     Oct 22, 2025 22:06 UTC   364d            kubernetes                      no
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ!

kubeadm –Ω–µ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–Ω—ã–º —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–º, –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º—ã–º –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–º kubelet.

–ü—Ä–∏ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–µ systemd-—é–Ω–∏—Ç–∞ kubelet –ø—Ä–æ–∏—Å—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç –∏–Ω–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∞ –Ω–∞ –≤—ã–ø—É—Å–∫ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞. –î–ª—è –∑–∞–≤–µ—Ä—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–∞ —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É–µ—Ç—Å—è —Ä—É—á–Ω–æ–µ –ø–æ–¥—Ç–≤–µ—Ä–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã: kubectl certificate approve $CERT_NAME.

RotateKubeletServerCertificate

–î–ª—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π —Ä–æ—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤ kubelet —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É–µ—Ç—Å—è –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–∏ –¥–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏:

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è Kube-Apiserver

  • Static Pod
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - --feature-gates=RotateKubeletServerCertificate=true
  • Kubeadm Configs
apiServer:
  extraArgs:
    feature-gates: "RotateKubeletServerCertificate=true"

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è Kube-Controller-Manager

  • Static Pod
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - --feature-gates=RotateKubeletServerCertificate=true
  • Kubeadm Configs
controllerManager:
  extraArgs:
    feature-gates: "RotateKubeletServerCertificate=true"

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è Kubelet

  • Kubelet Custom Config
rotateCertificates: true
featureGates:
  RotateKubeletServerCertificate: true
–í–∞–∂–Ω–æ –¥–ª—è –æ–±–ª–∞—á–Ω—ã—Ö —Å—Ä–µ–¥!

–ï—Å–ª–∏ –≤—ã –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç–µ Cloud Controller Manager (CCM), —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç –Ω–µ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –≤—ã–¥–∞–Ω –¥–æ —Ç–µ—Ö –ø–æ—Ä, –ø–æ–∫–∞ CCM –Ω–µ –Ω–∞–∑–Ω–∞—á–∏—Ç –¥–ª—è Node –∞–¥—Ä–µ—Å –≤ –ø–æ–ª–µ INTERNAL_IP.

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

kubeadm –Ω–µ –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞–µ—Ç —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞, –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–º kubelet.

K8S-API client > Etcd server

  • HardWay
  • Kubeadm

–†–∞–±–æ—á–∞—è –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è

mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/pki
mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/kubernetes/openssl/apiserver-etcd-client.conf
[ req ]
default_bits        = 2048
prompt              = no
default_md          = sha256
distinguished_name  = dn

[ dn ]
CN = kube-apiserver-etcd-client

[ v3_ext ]
authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid,issuer:always
basicConstraints=CA:FALSE
keyUsage=keyEncipherment,dataEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage=clientAuth
EOF

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–ª—é—á–∞

openssl genrsa \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver-etcd-client.key 2048

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è CSR

openssl req \
  -new \
  -key    /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver-etcd-client.key \
  -out    /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/apiserver-etcd-client.csr \
  -config /etc/kubernetes/openssl/apiserver-etcd-client.conf

–ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å—å CSR

openssl x509 \
  -req \
  -days 365 \
  -sha256 \
  -CA /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.crt \
  -CAkey /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.key \
  -CAcreateserial \
  -in /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/apiserver-etcd-client.csr \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver-etcd-client.crt \
  -extensions v3_ext \
  -extfile /etc/kubernetes/openssl/apiserver-etcd-client.conf
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–æ–≤:

  • SSL Certificate Check.
/etc/kubernetes/openssl/cert-report.sh /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver-etcd-client.crt
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE                EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
apiserver-etcd-client      Oct 22, 2025 22:06 UTC   364d            etcd-ca                 no

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤

kubeadm init phase certs apiserver-etcd-client \
  --config=/var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—á–∞–Ω–∏–µ

–ü–æ—Å–ª–µ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–π –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥.

#### –ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤
[certs] Generating "apiserver-etcd-client" certificate and key
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –Ω–µ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–∞ –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞—Ç—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞, —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω—ã—Ö.

kubeadm certs check-expiration
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE                EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
apiserver-etcd-client      Oct 22, 2025 22:06 UTC   364d            etcd-ca                 no

K8S-API client > Kubelet server

  • HardWay
  • Kubeadm

–†–∞–±–æ—á–∞—è –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è

mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/pki
mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/kubernetes/openssl/apiserver-kubelet-client.conf
[ req ]
default_bits        = 2048
prompt              = no
default_md          = sha256
distinguished_name  = dn

[ dn ]
CN = kube-apiserver-kubelet-client
O  = kubeadm:cluster-admins

[ v3_ext ]
authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid,issuer:always
basicConstraints=CA:FALSE
keyUsage=keyEncipherment,dataEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage=clientAuth
EOF

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–ª—é—á–∞

openssl genrsa \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver-kubelet-client.key 2048

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è CSR

openssl req \
  -new \
  -key    /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver-kubelet-client.key \
  -out    /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/apiserver-kubelet-client.csr \
  -config /etc/kubernetes/openssl/apiserver-kubelet-client.conf

–ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å—å CSR

openssl x509 \
  -req \
  -days 365 \
  -sha256 \
  -CA /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.crt \
  -CAkey /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.key \
  -CAcreateserial \
  -in /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/apiserver-kubelet-client.csr \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver-kubelet-client.crt \
  -extensions v3_ext \
  -extfile /etc/kubernetes/openssl/apiserver-kubelet-client.conf
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–æ–≤:

  • SSL Certificate Check.
/etc/kubernetes/openssl/cert-report.sh /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver.crt
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE                EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
apiserver-kubelet-client   Oct 22, 2025 22:06 UTC   364d            ca                      no

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤

kubeadm init phase certs apiserver-kubelet-client \
  --config=/var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—á–∞–Ω–∏–µ

–ü–æ—Å–ª–µ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–π –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥.

#### ␀–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤
[certs] Generating "apiserver-kubelet-client" certificate and key
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –Ω–µ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–∞ –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞—Ç—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞, —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω—ã—Ö.

kubeadm certs check-expiration
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE                EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXTERNALLY MANAGED

K8S-API server

  • HardWay
  • Kubeadm

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

export CLUSTER_NAME=my-first-cluster
export BASE_DOMAIN=example.com
export CLUSTER_DOMAIN=cluster.local
export FULL_HOST_NAME=${HOST_NAME}.${CLUSTER_NAME}.${BASE_DOMAIN}
export CLUSTER_API_ENDPOINT=api.my-first-cluster.example.com

–†–∞–±–æ—á–∞—è –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è

mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/pki
mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/kubernetes/openssl/apiserver.conf
[ req ]
default_bits        = 2048
prompt              = no
default_md          = sha256
distinguished_name  = dn
req_extensions      = req_ext

[ req_ext ]
subjectAltName = @alt_names

[ alt_names ]
DNS.1 = kubernetes
DNS.2 = kubernetes.default
DNS.3 = kubernetes.default.svc
DNS.4 = kubernetes.default.svc.${CLUSTER_DOMAIN}
DNS.5 = ${FULL_HOST_NAME}
DNS.6 = ${CLUSTER_API_ENDPOINT}
IP.1  = $(ip -4 addr show scope global | awk '/inet/ {print $2; exit}' | cut -d/ -f1)
IP.2  = 127.0.0.1

[ dn ]
CN = kube-apiserver

[ v3_ext ]
authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid,issuer:always
basicConstraints=CA:FALSE
keyUsage=keyEncipherment,dataEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage=serverAuth
subjectAltName=@alt_names
EOF

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–ª—é—á–∞

openssl genrsa \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver.key 2048

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è CSR

openssl req \
  -new \
  -key    /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver.key \
  -out    /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/apiserver.csr \
  -config /etc/kubernetes/openssl/apiserver.conf

–ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å—å CSR

openssl x509 \
  -req \
  -days 365 \
  -sha256 \
  -CA /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.crt \
  -CAkey /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.key \
  -CAcreateserial \
  -in /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/apiserver.csr \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver.crt \
  -extensions v3_ext \
  -extfile /etc/kubernetes/openssl/apiserver.conf
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–æ–≤:

  • SSL Certificate Check.
/etc/kubernetes/openssl/cert-report.sh /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver.crt
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE                EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
apiserver                  Oct 22, 2025 22:06 UTC   364d            ca                      no

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤

kubeadm init phase certs apiserver \
  --config=/var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—á–∞–Ω–∏–µ

–ü–æ—Å–ª–µ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–π –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥.

#### –ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤
[certs] Generating "apiserver" certificate and key
[certs] apiserver serving cert is signed for DNS names [api.my-first-cluster.example.com kubernetes kubernetes.default kubernetes.default.svc kubernetes.default.svc.cluster.local master-1.my-first-cluster.example.com] and IPs [29.64.0.1 10.0.0.16]
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –Ω–µ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–∞ –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞—Ç—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞, —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω—ã—Ö.

kubeadm certs check-expiration
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE                EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
apiserver                  Oct 22, 2025 22:06 UTC   364d            ca                      no

FrontProxy client > K8S-API

  • HardWay
  • Kubeadm

–†–∞–±–æ—á–∞—è –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è

mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/pki
mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/kubernetes/openssl/front-proxy-client.conf
[ req ]
default_bits        = 2048
prompt              = no
default_md          = sha256
distinguished_name  = dn

[ dn ]
CN = front-proxy-client

[ v3_ext ]
authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid,issuer:always
basicConstraints=CA:FALSE
keyUsage=keyEncipherment,dataEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage=clientAuth
EOF

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–ª—é—á–∞

openssl genrsa \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/front-proxy-client.key 2048

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è CSR

openssl req \
  -new \
  -key    /etc/kubernetes/pki/front-proxy-client.key \
  -out    /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/front-proxy-client.csr \
  -config /etc/kubernetes/openssl/front-proxy-client.conf

–ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å—å CSR

openssl x509 \
  -req \
  -days 365 \
  -sha256 \
  -CA /etc/kubernetes/pki/front-proxy-ca.crt \
  -CAkey /etc/kubernetes/pki/front-proxy-ca.key \
  -CAcreateserial \
  -in /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/front-proxy-client.csr \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/front-proxy-client.crt \
  -extensions v3_ext \
  -extfile /etc/kubernetes/openssl/front-proxy-client.conf
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–æ–≤:

  • SSL Certificate Check.
/etc/kubernetes/openssl/cert-report.sh /etc/kubernetes/pki/front-proxy-client.crt
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE                EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
front-proxy-client         Oct 22, 2025 22:06 UTC   364d            front-proxy-ca          no

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤

kubeadm init phase certs front-proxy-client \
  --config=/var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—á–∞–Ω–∏–µ

–ü–æ—Å–ª–µ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–π –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥.

#### –ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤
[certs] Generating "front-proxy-client" certificate and key
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –Ω–µ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–∞ –æ—Ç␀–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞—Ç—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞, —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω—ã—Ö.

kubeadm certs check-expiration
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE                EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
front-proxy-client         Oct 22, 2025 22:06 UTC   364d            front-proxy-ca          no

Etcd client > Etcd

  • HardWay
  • Kubeadm

–†–∞–±–æ—á–∞—è –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è

mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd
mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/kubernetes/openssl/healthcheck-client.conf
[ req ]
default_bits        = 2048
prompt              = no
default_md          = sha256
distinguished_name  = dn

[ dn ]
CN = kube-etcd-healthcheck-client

[ v3_ext ]
authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid,issuer:always
basicConstraints=CA:FALSE
keyUsage=keyEncipherment,dataEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage=clientAuth
EOF

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–ª—é—á–∞

openssl genrsa \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/healthcheck-client.key 2048

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è CSR

openssl req \
  -new \
  -key /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/healthcheck-client.key \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/etcd-client.csr \
  -config /etc/kubernetes/openssl/healthcheck-client.conf

–ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å—å CSR

openssl x509 \
  -req \
  -days 365 \
  -sha256 \
  -CA /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.crt \
  -CAkey /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.key \
  -CAcreateserial \
  -in /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/etcd-client.csr \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/healthcheck-client.crt \
  -extensions v3_ext \
  -extfile /etc/kubernetes/openssl/healthcheck-client.conf
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–æ–≤:

  • SSL Certificate Check.
/etc/kubernetes/openssl/cert-report.sh /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/healthcheck-client.crt
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE                EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
etcd-healthcheck-client    Oct 22, 2025 22:06 UTC   364d            etcd-ca                 no

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤

kubeadm init phase certs etcd-healthcheck-client \
  --config=/var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—á–∞–Ω–∏–µ

–ü–æ—Å–ª–µ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã –º—ã –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–π –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥.

#### –ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤
[certs] Generating "etcd/healthcheck-client" certificate and key
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –Ω–µ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–∞ –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞—Ç—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞, —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω—ã—Ö.

kubeadm certs check-expiration
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE                EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
etcd-healthcheck-client    Oct 22, 2025 22:06 UTC   364d            etcd-ca                 no

Etcd server

  • HardWay
  • Kubeadm

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

export CLUSTER_NAME=my-first-cluster
export BASE_DOMAIN=example.com
export FULL_HOST_NAME=${HOST_NAME}.${CLUSTER_NAME}.${BASE_DOMAIN}
export MACHINE_LOCAL_ADDRESS=$(ip -4 addr show scope global | awk '/inet/ {print $2; exit}' | cut -d/ -f1)

–†–∞–±–æ—á–∞—è –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è

mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/pki
mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/kubernetes/openssl/etcd-server.conf
[ req ]
default_bits        = 2048
prompt              = no
default_md          = sha256
distinguished_name  = dn
req_extensions      = req_ext

[ req_ext ]
subjectAltName = @alt_names

[ alt_names ]
DNS.1 = localhost
DNS.2 = ${HOST_NAME}
DNS.3 = ${FULL_HOST_NAME}
IP.1  = 127.0.0.1
IP.2  = 0:0:0:0:0:0:0:1
IP.3  = ${MACHINE_LOCAL_ADDRESS}

[ dn ]
CN = ${FULL_HOST_NAME}

[ v3_ext ]
authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid,issuer:always
basicConstraints=CA:FALSE
keyUsage=keyEncipherment,dataEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage=serverAuth,clientAuth
subjectAltName=@alt_names
EOF

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–ª—é—á–∞

openssl genrsa \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/server.key 2048

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è CSR

openssl req \
  -new \
  -key /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/server.key \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/etcd-server.csr \
  -config /etc/kubernetes/openssl/etcd-server.conf

–ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å—å CSR

openssl x509 \
  -req \
  -days 365 \
  -sha256 \
  -CA /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.crt \
  -CAkey /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.key \
  -CAcreateserial \
  -in /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/etcd-server.csr \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/server.crt \
  -extensions v3_ext \
  -extfile /etc/kubernetes/openssl/etcd-server.conf
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–æ–≤:

  • SSL Certificate Check.
/etc/kubernetes/openssl/cert-report.sh /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/server.crt
–í—ã–≤␀–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE                EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
etcd-server                Oct 22, 2025 22:06 UTC   364d            etcd-ca                 no

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤

kubeadm init phase certs etcd-server \
  --config=/var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—á–∞–Ω–∏–µ

–ü–æ—Å–ª–µ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–π –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥.

#### –ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤
[certs] Generating "etcd/server" certificate and key
[certs] etcd/server serving cert is signed for DNS names [localhost master-1.my-first-cluster.example.com] and IPs [192.168.10.27 127.0.0.1 ::1]
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –Ω–µ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–∞ –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞—Ç—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞, —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω—ã—Ö.

kubeadm certs check-expiration
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE                EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
etcd-server                Oct 22, 2025 22:06 UTC   364d            etcd-ca                 no

Etcd peer > Etcd

  • HardWay
  • Kubeadm

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

export CLUSTER_NAME=my-first-cluster
export FULL_HOST_NAME=${HOST_NAME}.${CLUSTER_NAME}.${BASE_DOMAIN}
export MACHINE_LOCAL_ADDRESS=$(ip -4 addr show scope global | awk '/inet/ {print $2; exit}' | cut -d/ -f1)

–†–∞–±–æ—á–∞—è –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è

mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/pki
mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/kubernetes/openssl/etcd-peer.conf
[ req ]
default_bits        = 2048
prompt              = no
default_md          = sha256
distinguished_name  = dn
req_extensions      = req_ext

[ req_ext ]
subjectAltName = @alt_names

[ alt_names ]
DNS.1 = localhost
DNS.2 = ${HOST_NAME}
DNS.3 = ${FULL_HOST_NAME}
IP.1  = 127.0.0.1
IP.2  = 0:0:0:0:0:0:0:1
IP.3  = ${MACHINE_LOCAL_ADDRESS}

[ dn ]
CN = ${FULL_HOST_NAME}

[ v3_ext ]
authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid,issuer:always
basicConstraints=CA:FALSE
keyUsage=keyEncipherment,dataEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage=serverAuth,clientAuth
subjectAltName=@alt_names
EOF

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–ª—é—á–∞

openssl genrsa \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/peer.key 2048

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è CSR

openssl req \
  -new \
  -key /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/peer.key \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/etcd-peer.csr \
  -config /etc/kubernetes/openssl/etcd-peer.conf

–ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å—å CSR

openssl x509 \
  -req \
  -days 365 \
  -sha256 \
  -CA /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.crt \
  -CAkey /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.key \
  -CAcreateserial \
  -in /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/etcd-peer.csr \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/peer.crt \
  -extensions v3_ext \
  -extfile /etc/kubernetes/openssl/etcd-peer.conf
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–æ–≤:

  • SSL Certificate Check.
/etc/kubernetes/openssl/cert-report.sh /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/peer.crt
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE                EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
etcd-peer                  Oct 22, 2025 22:06 UTC   364d            etcd-ca                 no

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤

kubeadm init phase certs etcd-peer \
  --config=/var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—á–∞–Ω–∏–µ

–ü–æ—Å–ª–µ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–π –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥.

#### –ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤
[certs] Generating "etcd/peer" certificate and key
[certs] etcd/peer serving cert is signed for DNS names [localhost master-1.my-first-cluster.example.com] and IPs [192.168.10.27 127.0.0.1 ::1]
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –Ω–µ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–∞ –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞—Ç—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞, —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω—ã—Ö.

kubeadm certs check-expiration
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE                EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
etcd-peer                  Oct 22, 2025 22:06 UTC   364d            etcd-ca                 no

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π

‚óè –û–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –∫ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é

  • Kubelet Server
  • API -> Etcd
  • API -> Kubelet
  • API Server
  • Proxy -> API
  • Etcd Client
  • Etcd Server
  • Etcd Peer

Kubelet server

  • HardWay
  • Kubeadm

–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è

export CLUSTER_NAME=my-first-cluster
export BASE_DOMAIN=example.com
export CLUSTER_DOMAIN=cluster.local
export FULL_HOST_NAME=${HOST_NAME}.${CLUSTER_NAME}.${BASE_DOMAIN}
export MACHINE_LOCAL_ADDRESS=$(ip -4 addr show scope global | awk '/inet/ {print $2; exit}' | cut -d/ -f1)

–†–∞–±–æ—á–∞—è –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è

mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/pki
mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr
mkdir -p /var/lib/kubelet/pki

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/kubernetes/openssl/kubelet-server.conf
[ req ]
default_bits        = 2048
prompt              = no
default_md          = sha256
distinguished_name  = dn
req_extensions      = req_ext

[ req_ext ]
subjectAltName = @alt_names

[ alt_names ]
DNS.1 = localhost
DNS.2 = ${HOST_NAME}
DNS.3 = ${FULL_HOST_NAME}
IP.1  = 127.0.0.1
IP.2  = 0:0:0:0:0:0:0:1
IP.3  = ${MACHINE_LOCAL_ADDRESS}

[ dn ]
CN = "system:node:${FULL_HOST_NAME}
O  = "system:nodes"

[ v3_ext ]
authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid,issuer:always
basicConstraints=CA:FALSE
keyUsage=keyEncipherment,dataEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage=serverAuth
subjectAltName=@alt_names
EOF

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–ª—é—á–∞

openssl genrsa \
  -out /var/lib/kubelet/pki/kubelet-server-key.pem 2048

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è CSR

openssl req \
-new \
-key /var/lib/kubelet/pki/kubelet-server-key.pem \
-out /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/kubelet-server.csr \
-config /etc/kubernetes/openssl/kubelet-server.conf

–ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å—å CSR

openssl x509 \
  -req \
  -days 365 \
  -sha256 \
  -outform PEM \
  -CA /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.crt \
  -CAkey /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.key \
  -CAcreateserial \
  -in /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/kubelet-server.csr \
  -out /var/lib/kubelet/pki/kubelet-server.pem \
  -extensions v3_ext \
  -extfile /etc/kubernetes/openssl/kubelet-server.conf
cat /var/lib/kubelet/pki/kubelet-server.pem /var/lib/kubelet/pki/kubelet-server-key.pem >> /var/lib/kubelet/pki/kubelet-server-$(date '+%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S').pem
ln -s /var/lib/kubelet/pki/kubelet-server-$(date '+%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S').pem /var/lib/kubelet/pki/kubelet-server-current.pem
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã␀–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–æ–≤:

  • SSL Certificate Check.
/etc/kubernetes/openssl/cert-report.sh /var/lib/kubelet/pki/kubelet-server.pem
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE                EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
kubelet-server-current     Oct 22, 2025 22:06 UTC   364d            kubernetes                      no
–í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–ò–º–µ–π—Ç–µ –≤ –≤–∏–¥—É: –Ω–∞ —ç—Ç–∞–ø–µ Join –Ω–µ–ª—å–∑—è –≤—ã–±—Ä–∞—Ç—å, –∫–∞–∫–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç—ã –≥–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å ‚Äî kubeadm —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—ë—Ç –∏—Ö –≤—Å–µ —Å—Ä–∞–∑—É, –≤ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–º –æ–±—ä—ë–º–µ.

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤

kubeadm join phase control-plane-prepare certs \
  --config=/var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—á–∞–Ω–∏–µ
[preflight] Reading configuration from the cluster...
[preflight] FYI: You can look at this config file with 'kubectl -n kube-system get cm kubeadm-config -o yaml'
[certs] Using certificateDir folder "/etc/kubernetes/pki"
[certs] Generating "etcd/server" certificate and key
[certs] etcd/server serving cert is signed for DNS names [localhost master-1.my-first-cluster.example.com master-3.my-first-cluster.example.com] and IPs [217.114.0.145 127.0.0.1 ::1 31.129.111.153]
[certs] Generating "etcd/peer" certificate and key
[certs] etcd/peer serving cert is signed for DNS names [localhost master-1.my-first-cluster.example.com master-3.my-first-cluster.example.com] and IPs [217.114.0.145 127.0.0.1 ::1 31.129.111.153]
[certs] Generating "etcd/healthcheck-client" certificate and key
[certs] Generating "apiserver-etcd-client" certificate and key
[certs] Generating "apiserver" certificate and key
[certs] apiserver serving cert is signed for DNS names [api.my-first-cluster.example.com kubernetes kubernetes.default kubernetes.default.svc kubernetes.default.svc.my-first-cluster.example.com master-3.my-first-cluster.example.com] and IPs [29.64.0.1 217.114.0.145 31.129.111.153 127.0.0.1]
[certs] Generating "apiserver-kubelet-client" certificate and key
[certs] Generating "front-proxy-client" certificate and key
[certs] Valid certificates and keys now exist in "/etc/kubernetes/pki"
[certs] Using the existing "sa" key
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

kubeadm –Ω–µ –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞–µ—Ç —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞, –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–º kubelet.

K8S-API client > Etcd server

  • HardWay
  • Kubeadm

–†–∞–±–æ—á–∞—è –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è

mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/pki
mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/kubernetes/openssl/apiserver-etcd-client.conf
[ req ]
default_bits        = 2048
prompt              = no
default_md          = sha256
distinguished_name  = dn

[ dn ]
CN = kube-apiserver-etcd-client

[ v3_ext ]
authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid,issuer:always
basicConstraints=CA:FALSE
keyUsage=keyEncipherment,dataEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage=clientAuth
EOF

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–ª—é—á–∞

openssl genrsa \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver-etcd-client.key 2048

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è CSR

openssl req \
  -new \
  -key    /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver-etcd-client.key \
  -out    /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/apiserver-etcd-client.csr \
  -config /etc/kubernetes/openssl/apiserver-etcd-client.conf

–ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å—å CSR

openssl x509 \
  -req \
  -days 365 \
  -sha256 \
  -CA /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.crt \
  -CAkey /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.key \
  -CAcreateserial \
  -in /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/apiserver-etcd-client.csr \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver-etcd-client.crt \
  -extensions v3_ext \
  -extfile /etc/kubernetes/openssl/apiserver-etcd-client.conf
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–æ–≤:

  • SSL Certificate Check.
/etc/kubernetes/openssl/cert-report.sh /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver-etcd-client.crt
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
CERTIFICATE                EXPIRES                  RESIDUAL TIME   CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY   EXTERNALLY MANAGED
apiserver-etcd-client      Oct 22, 2025 22:06 UTC   364d            etcd-ca                 no
–í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–ò–º–µ–π—Ç–µ –≤ –≤–∏–¥—É: –Ω–∞ —ç—Ç–∞–ø–µ Join –Ω–µ–ª—å–∑—è –≤—ã–±—Ä–∞—Ç—å, –∫␀–∞–∫–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç—ã –≥–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å ‚Äî kubeadm —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—ë—Ç –∏—Ö –≤—Å–µ —Å—Ä–∞–∑—É, –≤ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–º –æ–±—ä—ë–º–µ.

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤

kubeadm join phase control-plane-prepare certs \
  --config=/var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—á–∞–Ω–∏–µ
[preflight] Reading configuration from the cluster...
[preflight] FYI: You can look at this config file with 'kubectl -n kube-system get cm kubeadm-config -o yaml'

[certs] Generating "etcd/server" certificate and key

[certs] Generating "etcd/peer" certificate and key
[certs] etcd/peer serving cert is signed for DNS names [localhost master-1.my-first-cluster.example.com master-3.my-first-cluster.example.com] and IPs [217.114.0.145 127.0.0.1 ::1 31.129.111.153]

–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –Ω–µ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–∞ –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞—Ç—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞, —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω—ã—Ö.

kubeadm certs check-expiration
–í—ã–≤–æ–¥ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã

K8S-API client > Kubelet server

  • HardWay
  • Kubeadm

–†–∞–±–æ—á–∞—è –¥–∏—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è

mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/pki
mkdir -p /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è

cat <<EOF > /etc/kubernetes/openssl/apiserver-kubelet-client.conf
[ req ]
default_bits        = 2048
prompt              = no
default_md          = sha256
distinguished_name  = dn

[ dn ]
CN = kube-apiserver-kubelet-client
O  = kubeadm:cluster-admins

[ v3_ext ]
authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid,issuer:always
basicConstraints=CA:FALSE
keyUsage=keyEncipherment,dataEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage=clientAuth
EOF

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–ª—é—á–∞

openssl genrsa \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver-kubelet-client.key 2048

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è CSR

openssl req \
  -new \
  -key    /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver-kubelet-client.key \
  -out    /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/apiserver-kubelet-client.csr \
  -config /etc/kubernetes/openssl/apiserver-kubelet-client.conf

–ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å—å CSR

openssl x509 \
  -req \
  -days 365 \
  -sha256 \
  -CA /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.crt \
  -CAkey /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.key \
  -CAcreateserial \
  -in /etc/kubernetes/openssl/csr/apiserver-kubelet-client.csr \
  -out /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver-kubelet-client.crt \
  -extensions v3_ext \
  -extfile /etc/kubernetes/openssl/apiserver-kubelet-client.conf
–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∞
–û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –í–ù–ò–ú–ê–ù–ò–ï!

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–æ–≤:

  • SSL Certificate Check.
/etc/kubernetes/openssl/cert-report.sh /etc/kubernetes/pki/apiserver.crt

apiserver-kubelet-client   Oct 22, 2025 22:06 UTC   364d            ca                      no

–ò–º–µ–π—Ç–µ –≤ –≤–∏–¥—É: –Ω–∞ —ç—Ç–∞–ø–µ Join –Ω–µ–ª—å–∑—è –≤—ã–±—Ä–∞—Ç—å, –∫–∞–∫–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç—ã –≥–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å ‚Äî kubeadm —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—ë—Ç –∏—Ö –≤—Å–µ —Å—Ä–∞–∑—É, –≤ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–º –æ–±—ä—ë–º–µ.

–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤

  --config=/var/run/kubeadm/kubeadm.yaml
